1b1(mdo): / 'phags pa shind tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// / tad ya tha/ su
1b2(mdo): trir na sham/ sa mung wA na sha ma/ a brdzan sha ma/ sA rang ka sha ma/ sar yog ma ga sha ma/ ban dA nag ma si shu ma bi sa rasham
1b3(mdo): bA tA na sha ma/ sa mA kra ma sha ma/ a bid pyag ma/ sang skA ra sha ma/ bid dra nya na sha ma/ na ma ru'u ba sha ma/ sha R+Sha ya ta na sha ma/ swa rA sha
1b4(mdo): ma/ be ta na sha ma/ triSh+Thanam/ su bA da na sha ma/ bA ba sha ma/ dzA ti sha ma/ dza ra me baHdasha ma/ ya bad sarba nu
1b5(mdo): Sh+ya sha ma/ ya bid sarba trai dA tu ka su s+thi ta sha ma/ A rA pA ra shA ma/ 'di ni rigs sngags kyi
1b6(mdo): rten lung ston dam chen po yin te lung bstand pa des ma/ deng sems can rnams kyis thos patsam gyis srid pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / rab dang / srid
1b7(mdo): pa'i rgyu nyon mongs pa'i' rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing // gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa'i rgyu byed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
1b8(mdo): ba yin no// nyon mongs pa'i gang ke'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// / 'gro ba lngar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par
2a1(mdo): 'gro ba sar sus dang ga dang yid kyi nyes par sngon sa rgyas pa 'jam bum pa sa kyi dem da / ya myang ma tha thams cad kyang ldon par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags kyi nyi sung sodad pa 'jig gis sa
2a2(mdo): mthun par sems mo gcig pas mnyan nas/ nyin lag bdun du las gzhan gyi byed par chom 'di rnam par sgom par byed pa/ dge ba'i phyogs thams cad las yongs su nyams par byed pa dang // bigags byed pa dang / no
2a3(mdo): yongs su nyams par byed pa dang / sdug pa'i dngos po dang bral bar byed pa dang / lus la kun tu gnod par byed pa dang pa sems kun tu 'phrug par byed pa dang / myi dge ba thams cad la mngon par dag par byed pa dang / 
2a4(mdo): gyi dge ba thams cad la mngon par dka' bar byed pa'i sdig pa'i sas de dag thams cad ma lus par 'bras bu byed smrab pa zad par 'gyur rje/ mtshams byed pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 
2a5(mdo): 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa dang / srung ba'i sa babyung dang ma gtogs so// de dge ba'i ma ba des su kun tu spyod par bye di gas te sbyin pa'i ma ro sa tu bya rnyed pa kun tu mos par byed na
2a6(mdo): de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis bslabs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' dang / rkyend kyi rgyal ba dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis kyang byind kyis 'arlabs par 'gyur ro// de'i khyim longs khyod zad myi shes/ 
2a7(mdo): par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas sngar gsungs pa bzhin tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha ro sa tu phyind pa la goms par byed na/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
2a8(mdo): 'jig rten gyis myi rdzi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de lha'i dbang po thams cad skyes bya ba nas/ mye'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyu rad pa yin/ dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyurang pa dang / mngon
2b1(mdo): bar dka' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyurd pa dang / rab tu bsrung ba bgyi ba'i 'os su gyu rad pa yin// de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu kun tu
2b2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing / de la 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa dag 'ongs pa legs so// tshur nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi
2b3(mdo): zhing yongs su gnas par byos shig/ der nged kyis khyod sa bcu dag la gzhag par mdzad do zhes kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas
2b4(mdo): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyurate/ de der yang sa bcu thob par byed cing / ring po myi thogs pa dar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog pa
2b5(mdo): por 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu rigs sngags kyi rten lung stonadapa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu sangs rgya/ sa kyi zhing myi mjed de na/ sems can rnams ni nges par 'byed pa
2b6(mdo): 'icha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i che ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas dor ba dag yin zhing / mtshams myed pa byed
2b7(mdo): pa dag dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dag dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba dag yin pa'i phyir ro// de dag thams cad kyis ngan song gsum du yun ring por sdug bsngal rnam pa
2b8(mdo): sna tshogs rab tu drag po rab tu thub mo nyams su myong ngo // de dag ngan song gsum lus yongs su tha rad pa dang / yongs su dag pas dge ba bcu rims kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
3a1(mdo): shag kya grub pa'i sngon gyi smon yos kyi rgyas de dag gis seM sa rgyas kyi'i khyod kyi phyid rnyed du thagyi/ gang de dag spyod da pa'i dbang zin nu shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar dpa/ sbyin pa'ing
3a2(mdo): ldan pa la goms pa dang / shes rab dang ldan tha stsa gamam pa ma la na ma bya/ 'a ma sas su kyi rgyam rnams pa dang / byang gros kyi 'de tshum gomam tha dang / byings pa'i gnas
3a3(mdo): dra thoms pa sa goms pa dang / khyo pa byas pa thu pa pa ma rji thongs su sa bsab myo sun po sa ma sum thong brjod do// gam sus 'a 'do nas kyang / sungs rgyas kyi
3a4(mdo): bdag dang / ba bod nams cung ba dag / grub sachung bdag dang / kye bachung ba dag dang / TIb nganapas zhugs par na sa kyi spyo dag dang / da ma ngan pa sa dang pa dag dang / sgom las
3a5(mdo): ngan pa dang ldan pa dag pa 'ang da pa dan yin/ rnam par 'a sems bdan 'dun pas slong ma ga sa pa spyod pa gsum ma na dang / madra ba dngasam mang ba dang dang
3a6(mdo): mas cad dag nub bdag da / zhes dang san pad da / mi ma kyim yin pa na ma gas sa sa bya gying pa yangs rgyas kyizhi na
3b1(mdo): can pal ze ngan pa gsum du 'gro ba dag yin no// rigs kyi bu deng rig sngags kyi sbyin su du ston pa chen po 'dijig gis thos pa rgyas kyis sod la de dag nges par 'byed pa'i ma dang mthun pa'i dge ba dag gi kun
3b2(mdo): tu sbyor bas ngan song ki lam ngag las sgrol bar byed do// de dag sngon byas pa dad pa'i dbang po la goms pas dga' bar 'gyur ba nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i brabs goms pas yang dag par 'gyur ba
3b3(mdo): 'bar dang / smon lam dang / 'khor ba'i skyon dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa smos pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba yin no// bos pa tsam gyis de dag gi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad myed pa 'dres pa dang / songs
3b4(mdo): myong dang nye bar myod pa 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i bya ba 'phel ba byed pa/ dge ba'i sa ba yang dag par sgrub pa 'phel ba dang / shes pa ba 'phel ba dang / byams pa 'phel pa das/ btang snyoms kyi
3b5(mdo): bar 'phel ba dang / legs par byas pa'i las 'phel ba'i mtsho ga tu 'gyur ro// thos pa tsam kyis de dag thams cad yang dag pa li lta ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang dag rigs sngags kyi rten
3b6(mdo): sung bstand pa chen po 'di bkur bstir byas te/ nyan par byed cing nyin zhag bdud du las gzhon gyi byed par sems rtse gcig pas chos 'di dag rnam par sgom par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ dge bya bcu'i las kyis
3b7(mdo): dang ldan pa dag dang / legs par gyod pa gsum dang ldan pa drug dam dkon mochog gsum la skyabs pa dang / smon las kyi 'grus la mngon par dka' ba dag tu dang / chos kyi gnas pa dang / dkon mchog
3b8(mdo): gsum kyi gdung gsal bar byed pa dag tu 'gyur te// sems can gang dag der sngon gyi skyes nas myong bar 'gyur bar mtshams myed pa nas/ ltung ba'i rtsa bya byung ba'i bar dag ni ma gtogaso so ga/ de nas ga 'phos nas kyang
4a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi 'byed 'dir skyes gis skye bar 'gyur ba dag yin te/ gang dag gi sdig pa'i sas rab tu chen po'i 'bras zhurnam par sbyin pa sngon cad yongs su ma spangs pa'i sems ca de dag gis
4a2(mdo): rigs sngags kyi nyin lung stod pa chen po 'dams sa kyang yon tan de sa tha de dag thos par 'gyur ro// ba bams kyi yod pa yang de dag gi sil kyi 'i dbus tu byed pa sa sum pa yongs su mdabar 'gyur ro// 
4a3(mdo): sems cad de dag gis kyang de chos kyi nas grangs 'dis pa 'dag mi bar bya'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag ga sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugapa btsu par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pazhag tu thub pa'i ma
4a4(mdo): mchos kyi gnas pa kyis dga' ba yar bya'o// da #na byungan pa gyu'o// 
4a5(mdo): de semam can gdapa// dbyen sachog sasu sa da' ba mdog tu dag chen po de sa su 'thob pa'i gan par yod do// de dgagis gang banas pa bye ba wag zhig brgya stong mang thong ngan
4a6(mdo): mong gsum du mug 'bras drag po rnas pa tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de yang rim mthun pa 'di nyidas kyi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dzin pa ni sun ri du dad 'byung ste/ des de'i sngon tu gyi
4a7(mdo): dge ba'i lam 'phangs pa dag kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// 'jig gi mi san sag ca pas yongs su da par 'gyur ro// 'acig shin na bad pas yongs su 'ad par 'gyur ro gi ga nin mas sum bya / nas kyi
4a8(mdo): nyid spyod pa dang bral bas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// 'acig shin 'a'od dang thas rgya su dod pa byed pa dang / bcon dang gzhag pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// 'acig gan gyi mun pa dang / nye bar smra ba'i tshig pos
4b1(mdo): pas yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ ris 'thun pa' la de dag gis myi dge ba'i las sngon byas pa rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rigs sngags kyi gzhi lung stond pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no// 
4b2(mdo): ta pa ya/ kha ga pa ri dzI de/ kad+ha ka se/ kasma bid drA/ zab ka k+She/ ma po ke/ pa nyi re/ sha ma na mi ka Te/ ma sa me ga drA N+ye/ a sa 9/ khwa badz+re/ min dan d+hu She/ sa sa rba d+ha// ma rgyan
4b3(mdo): d+hu le/ bizab tu/ kyang 'bru/ 'i bcusas sa su kya pa kro/ sa dran lon/ sa bkunas gyim kyim thaM te/ su pa kA sa na / san rba 9/ 
4b4(mdo): rkyene/ sa yo man pa sre/ kro d+ha d+ha ro ka sha sa She/ sa ga kha ge/ na sa kun She/ bi d+ha ba me/ klan pa ne/ u b+ha ba ne/ su b+ha ba ne/ nas me ma ka re/ shi ri la ba ne/ mo kA d+hu She/ ri kon pams
4b5(mdo): nasu le/ sa rak+Sha ko 9/ nan sas byung/ mi dra bas ne/ mam a bas/ sar pa/ a 'das/ b.rab sams du ba rabs me kA d+ha kha mi sIr ni ni/ danyes pa// rigs kyi bu rigs
4b6(mdo): sungs nga can pa 'dzin 'du tsam na / sems can pams bdas pas byung ba/ zhus byed pa/ snang bar byed/ dran pa byeng sa/ bye ba 'i bar byed pa yin / ris ga
4b7(mdo): mas ga ci pam nyan par byed / sa bas da pa bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i sems cacad da ni/ de bzhin gnags pathams pa kyis byin gyis bams par gyu ro// zung chu semams
4b8(mdo): ga men pa las dang / rkye sa pa ca du/ ma kyi kyi ma ma nga tha / yung sa dzin pa'i bad po sa kyi da
5a1(mdo): par bya ba'i 'os su mya rang pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang ni mchod pa'i 'os su gyu rang pa yin no// shi nang tu bsrung ba'i bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur pa yin no// sems can de dag mi phyi ma'i
5a2(mdo): rgyas na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi che rnam par shes pa pa sa la phyogs bcu kun nas mdun na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / des phyag rkyong bar mdza
5a3(mdo): 'di skad du kye yon tan gyis phyag pa dag tur shog/ nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gnas par gyim shig/ de nged kyis la 'a sa bzhag par bya'o zhes kyang gsung zan mdzang ngo // de sangs rgyas mthong
5a4(mdo): ba'i dka' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa 'phags pa/ des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhib stong pa ma yin rab dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / de der yangs bcu dag thob par 'gyur
5a5(mdo): zhing myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ rigs sngags kyi rten lung stonang pa men po 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las zad par bya ba dang / rnam par
5a6(mdo): dag pa thob par bya ba dang / byang grol gyi bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de ltar don che ba dpal ma son che ba yin gyis song la myi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig/ nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa gas kya pa la la zhum shin/ 
5a7(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna pa'i snying po dang des 'di skad ces gsosad to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal legs so// yang de'i mi 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
5a8(mdo): gra byed pag tu myed kyang shig gra pa 'dzin mgasas // ma kyang ba migazhen pa pags ca sa bya pa dang / phyag gyis dang / babyed tha gyi
5b1(mdo): 'dus pa chen po de yang blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags thos par 'chas te/ bdag can
5b2(mdo): kyangab ting nge 'dzind gyi rnal 'byor nga la langs nas/ dang pos thogs par bdag cag kun byin pa ma lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gi khams kyi mjed de bdag cag kyang mchi bar gnang bar mdzad par
5b3(mdo): gsos// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// rigs kyi bu dag khye cag thams cad snyan cig 'thun par sred myed kyi bu'i mdog dang rtags dang / gzugs
5b4(mdo): dang dbyibs dang / myod lam dang cha byad kyis khyed deng shig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lags so zhes kyang gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal
5b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / lhan cig tu sred byed kyi bu'i mdog dang rtags dang / gzugs da pa dbyibs dang / gyod lam dang sa byang du bdag nyid mngon par yul
5b6(mdo): nam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpas pase kas rgyal lo 'azhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'chas te/ sun gsum bskor ba byas nas/ de nas chas te ga yud tsam gcig gis sangs
5b7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'dipa de dag phyi dad pa tsam gyi mdo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed thams cad du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gser gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phababo// de
5b8(mdo): dag gling bzhi pa'i byar ma 'dri ka la ba dang / yul ma ga ta'i zhing ga la de logs su dong ste/ dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
6a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ni tubasang / rgyal po gzugs phram srin po dang mams gcig tu chos gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad do// yang de'i mi byang phyogs sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga 'i 'byung bu'i byes
6a2(mdo): sed 'das pa ded/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgos sems cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba sod de/ sangs rgyas kyi 'di snyigs pa sa dang ldan par gnas pa den/ de bzhin gshegs pa gu bcom pa yang nga
6a3(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ban ma la chos kyang sto co// 'khor deng byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba chos
6a4(mdo): nyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur te 'dug no// denas kyang chub po/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam ma la'i snying pos gleng gis dam ma'alas smras so// des kyang des rnam ma' 'as byang chub
6a5(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu byed pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs canas lho phyogs su 'dong pa mthong bar gyur nga to/ des lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ snang ba chen po mthong nas
6a6(mdo): des de bzhin gshegs pa dpas ma rtag gi snying po gas pa de sogs su mas mo spang sa rab tu bdud nas 'di skad ces gsosad to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ting nge 'dzin kyin la 'byor nga las sangs nas
6a7(mdo): dgags das na kyang ma thams kyang phyogs kyi phyogs phyogs su ma ba dag sa yongs
6a8(mdo): bathun pa pacom ldan 'das so phyogs su rnas par bkas te/ snang ba chen po mthongasas bdag 'di sam rnasemapa nyi/ 'dis rgyani gang sags snyam lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpas me ton
6b1(mdo): gi snying po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' saH larang to// / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho phyogs kyi phyogs ma nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
6b2(mdo): ka'i klung gi brgya bu'i bye ma snyed 'das sa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed ces bya ba yod do// 'di ltar snyig ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sarba
6b3(mdo): rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'dus pa chen po la chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung kyi chos kyis gnas pa rgyan gyi 'chad
6b4(mdo): par bya ba'i phyir/ daltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gtam pa dbab pa bstand pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu stonang to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhin
6b5(mdo): pa dang / dri ma myed pa dang dzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'dus pa chen po byang bar gyur to/ 
6b6(mdo): de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che tog gi gzungs sngags gsungs te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyad nas gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de yang byang chub
6b7(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa yang dag par sgrub pa mdzad de// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / yang dag dang ldan pa myig gsum pa'i tshangs pa'i
6b8(mdo): gnas pa bstand kyang / de na da dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed sa dang nam mkha' gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa mchog tu snyan par gsungs pa'i chos bstand pas tshim par ma gyur 'o// mchog
7a1(mdo): dang na dang / da ngag dang ra 'dum dang ldan pa / 
7a2(mdo): dag dang / shes pa dang ldan dug tum po gang sa sa phyogs kyis margyas kyi da dag nas pa dag par zhugs pa dadas sa kyi ming kyi ma ma
7a3(mdo): 'i nang du chud par gyurd cig/ de nyid du 'khod nas kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs sa stobs ji snya pa dang / ji ltar 'jam pa bzhin du 'khod nas/ bsam gtan byed par gyur cig snyam dgongs so// 'amam gtan
7a4(mdo): byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'dis bu dper sa 'brum dgyi mang me la bu phyung po zhes bya ba rnam/ khacig gi sum las 'od 'di lta bu/ dper na/ tha ba dang nyim bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po'i 'ongs bu byung ngo zhes bya
7b1(mdo): ba'i bar du sbyar ro// de na nga lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de lta gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
7b2(mdo): cad na snyoms par zhugs par gyur da la/ sngon chad der phyind pa ni ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed der chas so// der
7b3(mdo): byi nad nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags de yang thob par 'gyur ro// skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bam
7b4(mdo): gtan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis che bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi/ ngad ltar ting nge 'dzind las langs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed der 'gro bar bya'o// rigs kyi
7b5(mdo): bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed de na yang sems can dag mchog tu che thu nga ba dag yin/ nad mang ba dag yin/ blo chung ba dag yin dge ba'i rtsa ba'i kun tu spyod pa chung ba dag yin/ bsod nams
7b6(mdo): chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bya ba tshol ba chung ba dag yin/ 'jig rtend pha rol 'jigs par myi lta ba dag yin/ longs spyod dang nye bar gyod pa chung ba dag yin/ 'dod pa la chums pa dag yin/ myi dge ba
7b7(mdo): spyod pa dag yin/ 'phra dog dang ldan pa dag yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa spangs pa dag yin/ de dag phal cher myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas/ ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no// 
7b8(mdo): de mi'i phyir zhe na/ de na gang dag 'drend mar spyod pa'i sems can yod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// de nyid du sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ sdig byed pa'i lus yul mo zhes bya ba'i ba dag tu skye ba
8a1(mdo): sbyin das kya/ da ma sa su byang ca du/ 'du dang sna da sa #
8a2(mdo): chu dngas pa dang / ra sa kyis me ma sa 'i lus spyod pa // par thobs dang bya sa yi nga/ da pangasa'i dmam pa'i phyirnams kyi sangs dag 'tho par byed do// kyis
8a3(mdo): ma pas kyi spyod rdza na sa ma dag tshig pa byed do// rnam sod sa dag kyang 'chog par byed do// 'a ba dang 'dung ba'i mdang sa das kyang 'brog par byed do/ deng de dag gis kyi mangs can
8a4(mdo): pa'i mdang sa thogs zhing / skyes pa la rgya mongs mdangs thogs bras de dag kyang mngangs sa kyi ri gcing ba'a' ba dang bzung ba nyams dpar yongs su kyang yin pa la yongs su spyod par byed de/ rgyu des na
8a5(mdo): kyi rnams mchog tu ma bdag dang / che thub ba dag dang / dran panya/ mas pa dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / bsod nams dang bral ba dag dang / 'jig
8a6(mdo): rtend pha rol la 'jigs par gyis pa dag dang / yongs gyod dang / nye bar gyod pa dang bral ba dag dang / 'dod chags la chums pa dang / kun sbyor ba myi gtsang ba dag yin zhes bya ba nas/ myi dge ba bcu
8a7(mdo): 'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas/ ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu sngon pa byang chub sems dpar gyurapa pa'i smon lam 'di lta bur gyur te/ 'di skar bya
8a8(mdo): byal brtson pa dang / spro ba dang / brtul ba brtan par gyur to// sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa 'das bsnyen bkur byas so// ngas thabs gang gis bud myed bskum ma bsrung / 
8b1(mdo): bar nus pa yang yongs su zhus so// pa'i brtson 'grus kang gis ma bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mangs na yod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba yongs su zhus so// lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am
8b2(mdo): nam mkha' lding ngam/ myi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ grul bum 'am/ yi dgas sam sha za 'am/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ brjed byed dam/ rims nyin cig
8b3(mdo): pa 'am nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ ro langs gang yang drug gam/ sngags kyi sbyor ba 'am/ sman gyi sbyor ba 'am/ lus dang sems la gnod par bya bar myi nus pa yongs su
8b4(mdo): zhus so// gang gis kyang ma 'am/ mngal na yod pa dang / skyes ma thag pa dang / 'o ma 'thung ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba/ yongs su gyod pa la gnod par bya bar myi nus pa yongs su zhus so
8b5(mdo): gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa'i sus gugapa ma thun pa sa pa bya kyi du sa posu su'o// ga phyi sa pa da dag ma mas gnam yo u lu'o/ sum dang mos lan par pos bya sa bde bdu ni mang sa / gnod pa skyed par 'byung ba yong su phum so// de ba yo srung gi / 
8b6(mdo): saca spyamya 'o brkyang sa dang / me 'ang ba dang / thong sa ran pa zhes bya babs dgeb 'acu'i sras kyisam yang dag par thangs pa'i ba dang / sbyin padang / rkyes pa dang / yang dag par thom pa ma mdzan pa nga
8b7(mdo): ba dang / 'jig rtend pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag kyang yongs su zhus so// ngas gsang sngags gang dag dang / sman gang dag gis sems can de lta bu dag yongs su sbyin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gsang sngags
8b8(mdo): de dag ni gang yin/ sman de dag ni gang yin zhe na d+ha/ gzung sngags gang gis ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu myed bya yongs su smyin par mdzad pa dang / pha rol da tu phyind pa druk+Sha la bkod pa'i rig pa yod pa'i
9a1(mdo): bran dang sngags kyi stong 'argya bar gyi num po// de dag sa tshusanapa mamam mam pa rnamasas/ marnam pas 'jams pa dang / sangs na gnas pa yang sngon gyi che bas dran nga/ 
9a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// nyid marnams sbyor ba'i lus kyi dbang po thams ched yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzugs pamang ba bstan mug pa 'dog pamang po rgyas bu mchog dang sdom pa dag dang / shin tu blo dang ldan pa dag bde legs su
9a3(mdo): ma'i sgo nas byung zhing bded ngas pa myed pa'i sems dang ldan padag tu gyur to// de ga skyes pa sa gyi mo ma sangs rlobs dang ldan pa dbang che bar grags pa reram ya 'bor brgya skong yod pa dag 'asrung ba dang rjes su ldas
9a4(mdo): byed pa kun tu gnas so// de dag myi dang myi yin pa zhes bya ba'i bang gang gis kyang rnam par tho bangs pa'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar myi nus so
9b1(mdo): mdangs blang bar yang myi nus so// gsang sngags dang sman gyis kyang rnam par po matsam par gyi dus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag mchog tu gzunas dang ldan pa dang / tshe rabs dran pa dang / 'jig rten papha rol pas
9b2(mdo): 'jigs par lta ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims la rjes su dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang / yon tan dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / 
9b3(mdo): dben pa la dga' zhing bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dge ba'i bshes banyen la mngon par dga' ba dag dang / de thob par byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gro ba/ 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin
9b4(mdo): pa'i zhes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to// sems can nye bar zhis la gnas pa nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu de dag la lnga dang / klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim gror bya bar brtson pa dag yin kyi
9b5(mdo): myi de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba la spyod du lta ba dang / byang gro sa gyi bde ba 'dod pa dag tu gyur to// de dag gis gal te tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de dag
9b6(mdo): sa pan pa dag kyis gyur / kya chun byamams brjed par byang chub sems dab ma cing nga 'dzin thob par gyur ci/ rang sa sa rgyas kyig pa la sems bskyed/ de dag myur na skye ba 'dzi
9b7(mdo): rjes sa mthun pa'i mamed bzas par byu/ rgyas sems pas dadag kyang rnas kyi mig pa sa sems bskyed par byed da/ semam pa de dag sa bathun pa 'dadi kyis 'did pa dang rjesasu sadu ci myod / 
9b8(mdo): byed do// sems can de dag thams cad kyong na song gsum dang zas pa dang / mo/ ris su 'gro bdag tu gyung to// rigs kyi srungs thabs su 'jug po'i byo las bdus pa das / sesus pan dag yongs pa sa
10a1(mdo): byas shing thar byed pa lung dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kub yang dag par bsgrungs dang/ rigs kyi bu rig pa yong ba'i sbubs 'i po lung bstand pa chen po 'a de/ de yang don me ma yin no// 
10a2(mdo): rigs kyi bu ngas sems can 'ad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag lo rig pa yod pa'i sbub po zhi ba lung bstand pa chen po 'dis spad sir ha kri mal thams nas/ nad pa la byim na mang thams cad rab tuzhi bar gyur ma nyid
10a3(mdo): gang na sman sing sa kIr myed par yang ngas de'i mdun tu bza' ba dang btung ba gang yin pa sa rig pa yod pa'i sbubs ni gsung bstan pas thabs nas/ nad pa la byim ma nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// 
10a4(mdo): gas pa de yang byed par gyur danangs sman bkus kyi bong bas rig du pa'i sgrub pa zhi ma'i gsang sngags kyig ni dag gis thams nas danang pas byin pa/ 'du thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// 
10a5(mdo): gang ma zhing ljond pa dag me tog dang / 'bras bu myi skye ba deng yang / ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gas pasngags kyi gzhi chen po dag kris char pa'i tshul thabs nas/ shing dag la btab na zhing de dag yo mang por
10a6(mdo): chu byed kyang me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan par gyu to// de bzhin cu bu ram zhing dang / dkun 'brus dag dang 'bru dang / sran dag gi bams yang byas so// gang nacang kyi 'bab ci mu byed pa de yang ngas lums kyi
10a7(mdo): snying la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis thabs nas shing tsam paga'i 'dab las bkris te/ klu mtsho'i 'gras du bzhag na/ cha chen po dang / chu chen po'i tshogs byung bar gyur to// de rgya chen po
10b1(mdo): byung bas sems can rnams kyi khyim dang zhing dang / kum dka' ra ba'i bar chung ba bar gyur den/ ded grangs sbrul gyi nas po'i nor bu la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi ka'i 'dis thabs nas/ klu'i gnas du
10b2(mdo): kha zhag sa char chu rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gang na dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / nyi ma dang dus ma yin par sngon dang mun pa dang / rdus gyi zer pa dang / drang ba dang dro ba dang / dus phyind ci log tu 'byung ba'i bar dang / dmag
10b3(mdo): tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang gza' dang rgya skar dang / tha ba dang / bu byed pa dang / dus tshigs dang / so rnams yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i bar la ngas snying rjes sems can rnams kyi med du zhas 'dun pa gcig
10b4(mdo): gi nyon mtshan du khrus byas nas/ 'o ma 'bras chan gyi khabs pazhing // tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par dka' bas rig pa yod/ ni sbubs zhi ba lung bstand pa 'di las gzhan gyi byed par brjod de
10b5(mdo): nyin bdun pa la gal te yul yongs su ma bskyangs na/ de banga'i mdun du rang gi dam bcas pa khyi gnas pa yin no// der yang ngas kyi lcam pa sbrul gyi snying dang bcas pa sa rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan
10b6(mdo): ba chen po 'dis thabs shing / smyug sman ma ra mi 'bras bu dag dang bsres te/ lha rten sar pa bzhag pas der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / nyi ma dang sprin dang / mun pa dang / rdul gyi char pa dag dang / trangadra ba dang dro ba thams cad ni/ 
10b7(mdo): bar 'gyu rdzog/ yang dag pa'i dus tshigs dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dang / gza' dang rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang / lo dag yang dag par byung bar gyu rang to// rigs kyi bu des na gang sems can dge mtshan dang bkra shis
10b8(mdo): dang ba ma ldan pa dag dang lta ba phyin ci log tu gyu rad pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag la ngas rig pa yong pa'i sbubs khri ba lung bsta nad pa chen po 'di'i chos bstan to// gang dang gang du sems can rnams kyis bos pa de dang de ba yang / 
11a1(mdo): rkyen mongs brkyang dru dag tu gyurang to// dges can dang bkra bris dang sa 'dus pa sam sa ma mangs te/ de byin pang rig pa'i sas dang yang dag par ldan pa legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang smon sas pa
11a2(mdo): yang ba das pa'i phung po da/ mabyan to// rigis kyi thad bzhin du ma ma mdzad pa 'dun pa myong ba'o/ 'dul pa sas sems pan rnam pa yongs su sbyin par byam gang ma ma tu byind pa cug gisam sams
11a3(mdo): rdzogs pa byas te/ thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i kyang chu kyi mngo pa dzon pa sa ma ma mas// gzi pa song pa'i sgrub pa 'i gsung bas nga pazhin pa 'don da ska sems can rnams la bces thas byed
11a4(mdo): yin no// de ltar bam yon mang ba yin te/ sems can thams sadangs phan par byed pa na thams cadarab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bu kyi dang sbrum ma thams cad srung bar byed pa/ rab tu b.rad par byed pa
11a5(mdo): nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ phung po dang khams khams cad yongs su zhes par byed pa chom thams cad rnam par 'byed de ra byed pa// babs thams cad yang dag par stond par byed pa
11a6(mdo): byang grol gi bde bsams cad yongs su rtogs par byed pa/ sems can thams pa danab tu dad par byed pa/ rnam mas cad kyi bde ba la 'dug par byed pa/ bdud dngangs kyi rgol pa thams cad chos dang 'dun pa mchangs rjod
11a7(mdo): par byed pa / bdud kyi yul thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa yin no// rig kyi tha min pa yod pa'i sbubs ni sasung bsla dang pa chen po 'di ni 'dud nams ca gcod par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed
11a8(mdo): pa yin te/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa// gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par ma su par byed pa/ su ma yidinams rnam par 'jom par byed pa/ nam ma'a' lding rnams dang bar byed pa/ phyi'am ci rnams dad par byed pa/ 
11b1(mdo): sto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ 'bab pa dang 'thab mo dang / mu ke dang / 'chi ba dang / nad dang / pha ro sad kyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / nad thams cad rnam par
11b2(mdo): zhi bar byed pa/ drang ba dang dro ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / sub pa dang / drad hrung po dang / reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
11b3(mdo): stond pa dbyed pag gu ma sa gsum gyi gdung rgyun gyi 'chad par byed pa/ 'khor bas skrag par byed pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ med pa shes pa skyed par byed pa/ kyi skye ba zhes pa rang gi mngon sum du byed pa
11b4(mdo): ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po sems cad rab tu 'jig par byed sdug bsngal kyi khung 'dod bar byed pa yin do// rig pa yod pa'i srubs zhis sung skond macan pa na 'di yin te mas
11b5(mdo): ma na kA/ mA ba krA/ g+ha sa k+ka/ dza ne kra/ ma ma na kA/ kra baH/ man d+ha k+ka/ mar+tha kra/ mam+bar hu/ bi sa nA ra/ Sha ka naHa ta na ta/ kun Ta/ pa ni kun Ta/ marba na Ta/ pa ri ka na
11b6(mdo): srad ta man s+ya/ sas/ kun padas/ mnam bya mam/ bya ba nas/ sran ran/ sing han dra nas/ sa sa sa rbaH/ mi lus ston Ta/ rgyas ma ca/ 'ab te thug pa ti/ rag nas ma
11b7(mdo): han su Na/ san ti nga dza \u0f7f/ ma mo ho/ ra ga chas/ a triN/ a triH/ ra ba/ a tri Nak+ka/ a ba ha/ sa mthi mak+ka/ e Sha e pa ma ho du Sha byas tra// / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di bstan pa na
11b8(mdo): 'khor deng srog chags bye ba phrag drug bcu ni rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa la thob par gyur to// dkrig phrag drug bcu dag kyang skyon myed pa la zhugs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ga sung
12a1(mdo): tha sems can rnams kyi las pad par 'gyural ba'i gsungs sngags la dang pa sbyin pa ma da// rin pa yod pa'i skub pa zhis 'di songs na mangs rgyas kyi zhi gyi mjed deng so zhis pa'i bka'i sa de badzin
12a2(mdo): gshegs pa zhag kyi grub pa ma gnod pachu ba mag bskyod pa yang ngam pad ma ma meg par gnas ma pazhes kya bzhus gis/ 'di skad du gar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
12a3(mdo): ga'i klung brgyad bcu'i byes snyed 'das pa de nas pa sangs rgyas dkyi zhing snyigs pa swa dpaldan thams na gas rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
12a4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bcu gas te/ 'tsho zhing bzhim la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas bcom ldan 'das la
12a5(mdo): yongs su zhu ba'i slang du bdag bdags pa lags sa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bskrun gyi mang sags sam/ gdod bcu lags pas/ khyod kyi 'khor po 'tshas ba dag ma mchis lags sas/ gnong
12a6(mdo): pa dag rgyang lags sems dam pa'i chos mnyan par 'tshal dgasags sas/ mi ska tshimamam pa de bzhin tupa rnas dam can snyi mor bgyid pa rlaphags pas// chos kyi gnas pa dag gis gnas par 'gyid / 
12a7(mdo): legs samakhyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ bdud kyi yul dang / klu li yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi gcig tu/ lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo rab tu bskor
12b1(mdo): gabasapa gang sa ngas pangs rgyam kyang 'a la las mnang ba sadapa dag pa dang / dbazhi gshegs pa dpas patan gsang sa kyis mam satsas tsas gas / tha'i sa
12b2(mdo): mdzad pa'i 'od ga ze kyi le'u semam can rnams kyi sus 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags sa dad pa yol ba mdzadagacinas rig pa chen po yod pa'i sbubs zhib sung bstan pa cheran po'i mabu me ba mas son che ba 'di bsrung banas// 
12b3(mdo): sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa rang thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa cod mongs pa bams cad ni bar bgyid pa zhes bya 'das sug babras kyi bur 'dod bar 'gyid ba zhes bya ba'i 'ar rig pa yod pa'i
12b4(mdo): zhi ba lung stodad pa chen po 'di legs so zhes kyang gso la cig da de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing mang tradra/ dang 'thob nas 'di skad ces gsos to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
12b5(mdo): 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la sa thogs pa'i ye shes dang gan gas pa ni ngo mdzad to// mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de ltar lags pas da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sngon ma thos pa
12b6(mdo): 'di ltar zab pa'i rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po sems can rnams la phan par byed pa 'di kho ma bsta nad to// gang la yon tan 'di ste bu grangs myed dpag tu myed pa de dag mchis pa 'di la/ ma'as/ 
12b7(mdo): pa byang chub chos par byed pa su zhig mngon par brtson bamyi bgyidang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can gang su dag 'khor bas sgrog cing byang grol gyi bde ba mngon par 'chal
12b8(mdo): ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang / rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzung sngags kyi mying bsgrubs pa na dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus pas sems can rnams kyi rnyed pa chen po
13a1(mdo): dang / dge ba'i phyogs rnam po pa 'gos par 'gyur ba sags so// donas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams me tog gi snying pos 'di skad ces bka' ba sa tsa// garigs kyi bu de banan no// khyod kyis rje/ 
13a2(mdo): skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dbyang chub sems dpa' gyur te/ brtson pa 'dis kyang ma gyong can smo sam 'di lta bu btab bo// bdag byang chub thob nas sems can gang su dag phyogs bcu'i mangs
13a3(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gams padan sbyin pas brtson pa'i bsas sacan zhes bya ba ma zhes rabs bson pa'i thams sacan zhes bya ba'i ba dag gis bdag gi phying zlogs par byed pa ma sems can thams cad kyis sems pa
13a4(mdo): byedad gas de dag sa sa dang rdzas yin du babyas par 'gyu da mas sa sa sa kyi pa da ngag gi pa byed par nig yong na sems cas de dag gi dge
13a5(mdo): phyogs 'bas pa bas bye dus / sngon byasas kyi bden pag pas/ kyang zhig pas kya nga dag par rigs pa'i byang chub ma ngan bar rdzogs pa
13a6(mdo): rgya bar ma gyur cig da kAng yang bud byed bu la mngon par dka' ba zhes bya ba nas/ bu'i zung gis skyo ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang / gang bud myed snyam sa zhes bya ba'i bamadug phyag 'tshal bar byed cing sems can thams
13a7(mdo): da kyis dka' ba das smos pa dang / dad pas bdag gi phying yongs su sgrogs par byed ma nas ma 'am/ mangs ma song pa des gyi 'am gyis yin pa sla ba'i sems kyis rnam par po 'tsham par byed pas
13a8(mdo): sngan dang / gsang sngags kyi spyor ba las kyang rung ste/ sus kun tu 'khrug par byed dam/ sems kun tu 'jug par byed dam/ zhes bya ba nas bcas pa cal gyi khams yang ba na lung cas gcig cam yang das par/ 
13b1(mdo): zo 'tsham par byed na/ bdag re shig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pam 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur da cig ces sdom byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smod lam de lta bu btab bo// de gzhan bzhin du
13b2(mdo): ngaskar yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ sdug bsngas de lta bus gzi rid pa dag kyang zhes bya ba nas ji ltar sngar bstand pa bzhin/ sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang / gus pa dang / dang
13b3(mdo): pas bdag gi kyi bu yongs su spogs par byed pa khams cad sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no// sbyangs pa ma yin na/ sngon gyims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyun ma gtogs so/ 
13b4(mdo): 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa 'i chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// // des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
13b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed ni ngo mtshar lags te/ de na sems can rnams mchog tu sdang gabu sums can grub pa ma dog dang ldan 'di nga brtse ba ma mchis pa bgyis pa myi 'cho ma tshig sub sor smrab
13b6(mdo): sogasus dag lags pas/ der kha cig gis bdag la po 'tshams ma myi rung ste/ nga na sems can rnams ma chag tu sdang ba gzu lums can/ bdag mchis pas ci yang myi sman lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
13b7(mdo): bka' maHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing / go skabs myed do// sus dmyigs myed pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa legs par bsgoms shig/ legs par yid la byas par gyur da pa de la ni/ bdud bye
13b8(mdo): bas kyang rnam par tho 'tsham pa 'am/ bar chad byed par nus pa 'di ni gnas myed do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yun ring po nas/ dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa shi nad tu sgoms shing legs par yid la byas zin
14a1(mdo): khyim ma 'jigs shig// tshigs kyi bu byong ma gas sngags gang dag gim spang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba dpan rmongs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis bzod pa dang dran pa dang / rab tu dang pa thob pa/ 
14a2(mdo): byed pa'i gzungs sngags dbyigs pa myed pa'i mangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyumathun pa'i byams pa chen po sbyin par mdzad do// / tad po yang / 'o bri / bu bul/ mal ba ra/ mi la ma ha/ macag bya/ ka gsas
14a3(mdo): gas shams pyid tu pyid trag tsakra pa ni/ ti leg sa kA ra/ ti ye/ tsum+b+ha si/ hi hi me la gab rtse/ na mdzan ga sa pan gyi rjeg gam kyi byin rje/ mying trar med/ mang hral A/ sarbas skyo byed rje/ sa sakra na byin rje/ 
14a4(mdo): man pas mying rje mnab dmying rjen me dri thar gying rjem rigs kyi bu snang bzhi par byed pa dang / rmongs par byed pa'i gas sngags kyi gzungs sngags 'dis tsam pa ka'i 'bru ma sa lan
14a5(mdo): bdun byabs pas lag pa gnyis bsdus na/ sdang ba thams da dang par byed rmongs par byed cing / sdang ba'i sbubs dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / bdud bye ba
14a6(mdo): brgya stongab yang rung sto/ snang ba'i tshes dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis cir yang byed par myi nus so// gal te sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad kyis gling bzhi pa gang bar gyur kyang sbyor chu gcig gis thams cad
14a7(mdo): de'i song kho mas myed par 'gyur ro// gas te mu rtog pa can gis rgyamatsho ba ni yongs su gang bar gyur kyang rung / sbyor chu gcig kho nas rab tu dang bar byed de/ 'di la be com myed kyis long la 'jig te nang gi khom
14a8(mdo): myi mjed du song zhig// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu myed pas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdog cag kyang de bzhin
14b1(mdo): gshegs pa zhag kya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyid pa dang / bsnyen bsur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po blta ba dang / nyis gyur ba 'chos kyis gzhan pa klu'i yul nam par 'jig pang sadzad pa la 'ong ci
14b2(mdo): kyigyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las byang ba'i gzungs sngags de yang mnyan par 'tshal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te der bdag cag kyang mchir gnang ba stan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed du 'ang/ 
14b3(mdo): cag mchi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpral me tog gi snying po des 'di skad ces bka' sa yang to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed thams cad so so nas gling bzhi pa'i khor los sgyur ba'i
14b4(mdo): byad dang/ rtags dang / dbyibs dang / yo byad dang / gyod la nem gyis lan cig 'bum par de zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dadapa' bye ba phrag bcu de dag thams cad kri p+ta'i khor los spru ba'i
14b5(mdo): cha byad dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang/ yo byad dang / s+yod lam mngon par srul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying po la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me
14b6(mdo): tog gi snying po'i zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ nam mkha' la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang rin po che las byas pa'i pad 'a
14b7(mdo): ma stong po bdun bdun dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang mngon par skul to// spyod lam de lta bus de nas chas te/ de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'dir 'khod
14b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed thams cad du kha cig gis ni gser gi phye ma'i char mngon par rab
15a1(mdo): tumam 'o// bamam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhag su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams la mchong pa'i las bya ba'i khyim lacig gis dongs kyi pa pa mdzad pa byung ba tum pa'o/ 
15a2(mdo): cig gis na mas kyi bye ma'i zer mngon par rab tu phaba'o// 'jig gis ni su tig gi ya ba tul ba'o// 'acig gis mi gzer slong dag mngon pa rgyas rjo na cig gis ma su nyin gdonas dag mngon pa
15a3(mdo): rab tu bab po/ kha cig gis ni dpung rgyan gyi rgyan dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni ras dang ram bcom bu dang / gzugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gi char mngon par rab tu yab ste/ de dag thams
15a4(mdo): cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'di lan gsum sor ba byas denas phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'du/ rnas pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las rba nya'i le'u ste gnyis/ 
15a5(mdo): pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgyal po ga shugs can snying pos sngon ma mthong ba tshangs pa chen po dang / brgya bya mtshan dang / phred byed kyi bu dang gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sbyar ba'i ma
15a6(mdo): byed dpag tu byed pa mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te// stan las langs nas/ hatsapa yang zag myi ring bar 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi pho nya bzhi po de dag
15a7(mdo): 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pakag kya thub pa gas pa de logs su bas so sbyang ba rab tu bdud ram 'thong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i thugs kyi ma pos kyang de bzhin gan/ 
15a8(mdo): bshag kya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog tsam pa ka li 'phreng ba dag gtor da to// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i sdang ba 'dzin // lha nyams pa 'gro ba'i lam
15b1(mdo): sros dpag / mnyam nyid ldan pa 'gro la phan mdzad khyod// bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzang byed/ gdus dka' 'gro ba nyon mongs par mdzang khyod// chos 'dir sdang ba yun ring 'bar mdzad khyod// bsam gtu
15b2(mdo): sgo 'di dag gis skyes mchog ldan/ zhing dam thams cad shin tu mdzes par mdzad/ rgyal ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas dgu la// rgyang ring nas ni zhing 'di brjod pa mdzad// 'gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'di dga' ba ste/ de mthong
15b3(mdo): bdag 'dir chos chen tshogs su mchis pa/ 'gro bar phyir skyes pa ni rnyed par dka'/ shi nang tu ring nas myi skye rnyed nas kyang / nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur dathub khyod ni/ rab myur nyon mongs dra ba gcod mdzad lags
15b4(mdo): sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs krung lhung ba/ khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral// rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag po nyaradabadags/ khyod kyi chos kyi rter la yi rang mdzad// btsun pa bcom
15b5(mdo): ldan 'das shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyasakyi zhing gang ga'i klung dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so/ 
15b6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag
15b7(mdo): 'dir ba dgas lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi lam 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di'
15b8(mdo): pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas say+ya zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci bstan myi mnga' lags sam/ gnod
16a1(mdo): bcu da nas / na sa sa mamasas/ sa bra mnas rnams de sanam tan ma
16a2(mdo): bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi ning 'dir bdud kyi lu suM mu lags sam/ khyod kyisangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam
16a3(mdo): 'din thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor los skong lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi lus 'di gang su dag 'khob sos skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi 'on tu de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mad+mo de/ khyod dang nyi ma'i
16a4(mdo): snying po chos kyis gnas ka'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa sa 'ong gzer gyi se na gzungs sngags 'dis dad pa sbyin par sa da lags so// de nas bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i
16a5(mdo): gzungs sngags ma thum ba' pan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod sa thams pa zad par 'thong pa gzugs kyi 'dod dgas 'a sa sod ba par bgyid pa/ gzugs byed pa'i 'dod cags
16a6(mdo): thams pad 'ang byung 'bying ba / dargyal dang lhag pa'i brgyal dang nga'o snyam pa'i dargyal thams cad zad par bgying sa/ 'di yang skubalags so zhes bgyi sa sngang bshad pa bzhin te/ rjes su 'bum pa'i bzod pa 'ang
16a7(mdo): ni bdud nAm gcod pa/ klu rnams pham par bgyid pa la rnams dka' bar bgyid pa// gnod sbyin rnams rim par bgyid pa/ sA ma yin rnams rnam par 'jom par bgyid pa/ rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar 'gyid sa
16a8(mdo): dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa/ bud myed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa/ mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar bgyid pa/ nas 'byor da pyod pa na yon dga' bar bgyid pa// nad thams cad ra
16b1(mdo): tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ke dang / dus ma lags pa'i nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rlung dang char pa rang chu bo dang / grang ba dang dro ba dang / thams cad rnam par zhi bar bgyid
16b2(mdo): ba' ba dang tsha ba dang / ro mya bro ba dang / grub pa dang / byang chung po dang / reg par dkal ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi rgyal rgyud kyi 'chang par bgyi sa/ 
16b3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi bstan po rtom par bgyid pa 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ zad pa shes skyed par bgyid pa/ myi skye ba shes pa rtogs par bgyid pa// ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po ra
16b4(mdo): tu 'joms par bgyid pa sdug bsngal kyi khyor 'dor bar bgyid de/ sreng po'i drung snyems par bgyid pa 'di yang slar lags te/ gtad pa 'a 'a ye thaya ba mi'ade/ banye 'am ban
16b5(mdo): mi zhib pa ri b+ha re/ a bes pa pa rin re/ te de te re/ ma sems pa mig rme/ kha ke 'a ga ma min me/ ma so / ma lo ka pa riSha ri/ sA me/ sname pa'i 'am/ rim
16b6(mdo): riwAr/ si le mas pa miSh+Ta re/ ka migs pa ri shwa re/ a o9/ a barba pa mib re/ ma sa mas pa/ sa mo la sa/ nA la ra sa// mal ma yid d+ha dman ma b+ha tang ga ye/ th+ya'u tang gas pa chi shA ma/ 
16b7(mdo): kras pa ri na reg 'gro dra kre he/ kro tra ma he pa mis re/ sA Na ga nyes kyi sem hA pa min re/ dzi d+ha ga he/ tIH/ pra ha pa ri bA re/ ka a mra he/ ka ya gra ha pa ribI re/ ma na pra ha pa liSha re/ ske mag tsa/ sA na \u0f89\u0fa4\u0f7f
16b8(mdo): pa ri bA re/ be da na kra he/ be da na gra he pa ri bA re/ tri shwa gra he/ tra shwa gra ha pa ri bA reH/ u pa da gra he/ u pa da na gra hA pra ri bA re/ b+ha ba gra he/ b+ha pa gra ha pa ri bA re/ dza ti kra he/ dza ti gra ha pa ri bA re/ dza ra ma raH/ 
17a1(mdo): ma he ba ri re/ tu lasam hA la \u0f89\u0fa4 y-i/ rgya la san tu pa kra pa mirnaman ma rab pa mdzan mam thar phags pa yin che/ a ma pa ma/ mar bar/ rdzam ga pa rin mo ma
17a2(mdo): bi 'a mya sa ra su ba sas kyang / beg gyi ni bas/ a rgya zhim the gzhan tis ha// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mnog des bden pa dang rjes su mthum pa'i bzod pa 'gyur
17a3(mdo): padi 'di sags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyi mjed du thams cad du ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtam
17a4(mdo): sa snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcoms dan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po la 'di skad ce nas bka' san sad to// rigs kyi bu 'dib stam 'di
17a5(mdo): nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas brjin 'bru dang bcas pa stag chad byed pa'i bden pa dang rjes su mthun 'i bzod pa rgya cher bston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu ni
17a6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa tsa mu pa ka'i mdog gis/ gang khyod 'di 'ongs pa'i chetshe srung ba phyir byin pa/ lus kyi khyad rdza.aTasgrub pa zhes bya ba nas/ shi nang tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub pa// zhes bya ba'i/ 
17a7(mdo): nyi ma'i gyen pad ma'i sbu ku'i gsang sngags de khyod kyis kyang stond cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// tad ya tha/ sid d+ha ma te
17a8(mdo): bi lo ka ma te/ e le ka ta ri She/ ru rje s+phu nu me/ bud de bi bud d+he/ ma sa bud de/ sun mad te/ sun sad ta pra ti Shi d+ha ne ra ga d+hu pa/ rA ka drA pa pra ti/ Sha d+ha ne/ bin nu/ bin du ma te/ tsaT tsan+da pa ti/ She dA me/ ma rge 6
17b1(mdo): drAr+d+he ka haH/ tsi ti/ sa ha ni mi/ ha ta ka/ ma me ke/ ha ta po'u mar+b+ba ba marbe/ ha ta kra sa ma te/ ha ta bri ma ta mud tre/ ha ta mu k+She/ ha ta ya ke/ ha ta ya k+She/ sa ta sa mu tra dza be/ ha ta bi ya na ra dza/ ha ta hiH/ 
17b2(mdo): ha ta tsi \u0f7f Te/ sa de da rba ra dze/ ha ta ba dza ma te/ ha ta u pa ka ma te/ ha ta ro ka ra shI/ ha ta ro ga ra shi ha da rba si ti/ had sa rngon ma da/ gnya gaHgnya bi dza/ gnya kaH/ sarba mA rka dza ga e kho na ma ta sa ngas
17b3(mdo): ra du Sh+ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des bdag chas pi dus kyi che/ srung ba'i du slad du nyi mA'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags saHsad pa ni 'di lags so/ 
17b4(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das gag kya thub pa me dang ldan pa stan pa la dka' bas yang pa/ snyan pa khyod sgyu ma'i snying po'i gya pad ma'i/ dbungs sngags 'di krung shig/ snyan pa de bzhin gshen pa/ 
17b5(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jin rtenang du 'byung ba rnyed par dga'o// de bas kyang nyi ma'i khyan pa ma na'i gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// rigs kyi cu
17b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyam thos kyis kyang rung // gang gis kyang mi'i rgyal po ra ba 'am rgyam tsho chen po yon tan dang lam yon 'arjod par nus so// gnyi ma'i spun 'ad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di la yon tad dang / phan
17b7(mdo): na skal pa 'am sasang ba sam skrag par u ste/ brjo pa yang gyi num so// nyi ma'i gyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di me de spar rab pa phyin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyi ma'i gyan pad ma gzul
17b8(mdo): 'di zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ 'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas pade yang dag par rab tu ston da cig dang / der sems can rnams 'dod pa 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas// zag pa thams cad
18a1(mdo): zad pa dang byang grol gi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// shing gi rgyal po rtsa'i drung du bdud ni gcig pu/ 
18a2(mdo): khyod kyis bcom/ byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang mi gcig pus brnyes pa lags// lha dang myi dang gnod sbyin gcig pus khyod kyis dbang du mdzad// rgyal ba nyi ma rab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od gzer lags/ 
18a3(mdo): 'din su stegs gzhan ni gcig bus 'od dang bras ma pa// 'jig rten kun na srin bu rtse byer dmas nyis ma sa na/ thub pa 'dus na sems can sgrol ba'i dod kyang mdzam sags te/ dkon mchog gsus kyi
18a4(mdo): gtang ma ma rnas su sa byangs nga// da ma / da chun mongs bas rgya mngon na pa @
18a5(mdo): ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i chos ston dang// khyod ni ye shes byang chub gyod parab mchog smonang par sa dang / ga gcig zus ni rang bdud mi sems cas rnams kyang ni mdzad pa/ yang mi
18a6(mdo): mamachis mang srang srog cags zag zig smos pabyod// gab sang cibs dang thal bar nyan mongs spangs gyur da pa ga mya ngan byed byed na pa'i grob khyer gshegs pa thod // 'dan 'jig ten bya sa myod kyi
18a7(mdo): sman dang mchungs te lags// rgyal ba mas kyis thong sa su ba'i slad du bcang bdags// rig pa'i rgyas po thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa po grub pa zla ma cos dang gsan nas gsungs kyang 'asrung ba lags
18a8(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lo phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'diras dbar bkyi thong khye chung dmas cam ma mngam tha bye za sa 'asus pa de sred kyi / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 'das nas/ snyigs ma lnga dang lda / 
18b1(mdo): de nas 'jig rtend gi khams snyigs ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang stonang to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag
18b2(mdo): 'dir bdags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chang
18b3(mdo): ya dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci snyan myi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung
18b4(mdo): lags/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chu dang lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyam par 'chal ba dag lags pa da ji ltar chos bos pa gzhan du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa
18b5(mdo): dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pa gnas par bgyid lags sam khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nam bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu laH
18b6(mdo): lags sas// 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par tsas kyi 'khor la thag lags pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ma gang su dag 'thar lo bskor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po de
18b7(mdo): dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yus rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems cadan rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas stong pa
18b8(mdo): nyid dang mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dad chags 'dod chags thams cad zad par bsti pa gtun kyi dong ka lnga dang gzus byed kyi 'a'od gdod shAs zad par 'gyid pa / nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i
19a1(mdo): rgyas dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par 'gyid pa zhes bgyi gnam / ji skar mA ma ba shad pa'i bar dang / sdug bams kyi zhum 'dor par bgyid pa'i bapa 'di yang 'gyur lags te/ 
19a2(mdo): tad bya ba/ d+hu ma te/ d+hus te/ a kI d+ha ma te/ tha byas/ d+has te/ sa rba ka / drus te/ ma kI Shak+sha/ bi me ta Sha k+sha/ a be k+ka Shak+sha/ a mo khe kA/ a ma mya la sa/ bya thid ti Sha k+Sha/ san mu ma'i k+sha/ man
19a3(mdo): khakA/ les sa 'gyu shi 'i la ga/ pa ti mi ma 'a/ sa gos lag/ sur 'an/ sa kI Sha k+sha/ sa pang sa mol kra/ ru'u la 'ag+sa/ sa bang gyi gnyam 'a/ tsakra du rgyal g+ha/ ya bad ma na pa de can pa la/ 
19a4(mdo): thi 'i zir tu 'akla sa yang 'di dacan d+ha t+ya la k+sha/ sarba srid tu badz+ra sa 'akra/ sa pad ma me ka'iH/ cu la kham/ sa 'das sa dag/ byi ba bas / ma nan/ sa sud dram na/ sa rbag sa
19a5(mdo): sarba mang wAr ba su bya ma na/ a kin man ma nab / semamamam ma la sa se hA/ bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa'i dang rgyal pos khyod / stong pa nyid dngarjes
19a6(mdo): su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lpags pas kyang
19a7(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba byi te/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa dag ni mi gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' ba yang to// rigs kyi bu 'di/ 
19a8(mdo): bstan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag tshad byed pa'i stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthus pa'i gsungs sngags rgya cher stond pa mdzad do// rigs kyis de bzhin gshes/ 
19b1(mdo): pa ri dbang rgyal pos gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa myi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa// sems can rnams kyi sems dang tshor ba sgrub pa yang dag 'du ba thams cad mkhye rang ba'i ye shes thob pa bdud
19b2(mdo): bzhi 'dul ba sgrub pa'i gnas dang chos kyi tshul dang / dkon gsum gyi gdung sgrub pa/ myi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i bar de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos
19b3(mdo): kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// / tad ya wa/ sha ra Ni bya ya / sho kA bya ya/ s+thi ti bya ya/ pra sA Na bya ya/ ring du bya ya/ in dra ya bya ya b+ha la bya ya/ bo d+hang ga bya ya/ sa sA dI bya ya/ d+ha ra ni \u0f7f
19b4(mdo): ya/ kra ti bya ya/ d+ha ra Ni bya ye/ a ru'u bya ya/ a nin dza byad ya/ marga bya ya/ a b+hi danya bya ya/ pra ti sam bi da bya ya/ b+hu da'u mi bya ya/ bid d+ya bya ya/ ma ha m+me tI bya ya/ bri thi bI bya ya
19b5(mdo): sad ta bya ya / d+harma bya ya da ma bya ya/ ma lo ka bya ya/ pra ti b+ha sa bya ya/ pra ti thud ka bya ya/ ka ga na bya ya/ mA ra bya ya shu Tu n+ya tra bya ya/ pra ti t+ya bya ya/ a pra Ni hi ta bya ya a mi
19b6(mdo): myid ta d+ya ya / ru ta bya ya/ g+ho Sha bya ya/ a ka na tsa na bya ya/ a bi sa pa/ a na nu/ a non/ a ba ha/ tsa tsA ra/ tsa tsa tsA ra bi mu/ tsa tsi \u0f7fkU/ tsatsa ra bi mu bya ya/ bi mu krA yi bi mu/ a pa bya ya/ bi mu
19b7(mdo): a sa mu dA tsa ra bi mu tshe dra bi mu ga a ka sha bi mu/ byA pa sha ma bi mu/ A na b+ha sa bi mu/ a ha ha bi mu/ a pa ra bi mu u pa sha ma sa/ li la bi mu swa ha// / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
19b8(mdo): pa ring dbang rgyal po des// bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag srung ba'i sad du myi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags saHsad pa ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
20a1(mdo): ko'u ri myal bka' sa la pa/ ko'u da n+ya khyod kyis myi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di lung zhig/ ko'u 'di mye de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed pa dka'o// 
20a2(mdo): de bas kyang myi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung skal pa brgya stong gis sems can thams
20a3(mdo): cad kyi sems kyi skad cig bgrang bar nus so// gang dag myi med pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di mun pa myed par 'dug pas zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag ni gag gis kyang
20a4(mdo): bzang bar myi nus so// koT 'di ci de ltar bas ma gyis dpa'i sbubs kyi lung bstad pa 'di ji ska thob pa 'khom ban bong/ da la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de dag chos de/ 
20a5(mdo): thos pas lus thams cad zad par thob par 'gyur ba nas so/ bas la logs pa byed ba dag dang / slobs pa gcad du myed pa da ga dang / spobs pa rgyun gyi gcad pa'i bar dag thob par 'gyur dang/ 
20a6(mdo): mapags pa las byung par bya lalags pa'idi bzhi gshegs pa gas 'a gyu ro// ming bya chub sems dpa'i sem pa dang yon po snang ma ma nang po da sa de bzhin gshegs pa ga
20a7(mdo): de sogs smrabs mo sbyang ba rab tu brgyang nas// dam mirigs su mang pa 'di dag gsol to// kro chug sug 'ams kyil zhing / nyon mo sa da kyis rgyam tu gzengs// khyod nisa'as la 'gon kya nga khyod/ 
20a8(mdo): nas 'gro ba smos pa nga pyong / ga bang po rgyag sa yongs gyur cing// chung kyi gags pas nyi nas// sa da sa man ko dang brgyang dzin na na ga da dga' / ya la gzug sas kyis gyim
20b1(mdo): ma rgya #/ nang na 'jig rten can kyis ra/ kyis kyi 'dzin pa sa sa ldan nas sa/ 'dus ga gsu sa sa
20b2(mdo): pa nas ma'i 'ching ba das las grol ba dza byed// khyod kyis 'grags pa dang nas su/ shing 'dir yang ni lpags pa lags/ 'didzin 'jig rten 'gron pa yis/ bdag thug po bar 'dags kyis gsonan
20b3(mdo): pa bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dims pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bzhi bcu la gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa nas/ des 'jig ce nang gi khams snying po'i rgyas mtshan nam bskye/ 
20b4(mdo): mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs dpa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'gro ning bzhes la chos kyang stod to// de bzhin gshegs pa des ma
20b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma ngags lags te// de bzhin pa shegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yus rna/ sa par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams
20b6(mdo): kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes kyang 'dri bar mdzad lags sam/ btsun
20b7(mdo): pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyun myi mngar lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags sam/ ji ltar
20b8(mdo): chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du yang / chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom
21a1(mdo): 'das dang pa smin pa maca lags so// denas ston pa myed pa'i dis su 'thun pa'i gardzas chags ma padod pa 'i sakyad pa bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod gas / 
21a2(mdo): gas pa shes gyi marnas ma mi pa'i sem pa'ig tu drug da pa da do// 
21a3(mdo): sa kyi ya byas na ya a[]sa ka rba ka na@1#/ mam da to/ cu 'a
21a4(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ba nan gshegs pa 'i shes dpal ga shegs rgyam po des spyod dpa byed pa'i rim su mthun pa'i gzun sa granas baphrub pa mi 'dis rnam so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs po
21b1(mdo): gnang ngo // bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs mo zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
21b2(mdo): kyis kyang dra chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ldang ba'i snying po dpas sa 'di ga ces bka' la yad to// rigs kyi bu sa 'di ba la bcugs pa nin sems can rnams pa dom par tsho chom 'bru babang po sas
21b3(mdo): myed pa/ smon pa myed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rgya cher stond pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal bache kas rgyal pos gang khyod la 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe/ byin pa rig sngags kyi
21b4(mdo): rten gyi lung bstand pa de khyed kyis kyang ston cig/ lung bstan pa 'dis ni 'dir sems can rnams kyi sred pa chung ngu dang / 'bring / he pa/ nyon mongs pa sred pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
21b5(mdo): de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams shi bar 'gyur ro// bskasad pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pa bsil par 'gyur ro// las 'byung ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs
21b6(mdo): thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du yangab 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin te bstand par bgyi lags so// tad yo tsA/ be g+ha pa ri che de/ ga d+ha sa kA se/ kA b+ha re byin dA tha b+ha ga kle k+ko ya yo ge pra ti
21b7(mdo): ha re sha man na si ka the/ sam e ga dza She/ a kA ya na te/ kra b+ha ba dze/ nid d+ha dzA She/ sa ma na dza She/ a dA sha ya dzA She/ bi pra ba dzA She/ shai kA dzA She/ sa n+ya dza ba dzA She/ sa li la gu h+ye dz+ha She/ swa la gu t+ya bAM/ kr-i bA na ko she
21b8(mdo): sa d+ha na ko no sa ba d+ha nan bye bi ta prad te u ba gra ma pa te.a na tshe d+ya pra She// pra ti gra me na/ sa kad b+hU she sa lo tsa na ba me gro d+ha d+ha re/ kA ma sa she/ sa ka shA Sha ge na/ na g+ha kun dzabid d+yA ba ne kA na ba me/ su tsa ba ne/ 
22a1(mdo): sa ma ma ka re/ shi sa ya ba ne/ mo lA bes pa ri kon ba na lan su'o// ras kA ko le/ nanA yu du re// min tra ma sa me/ soms pas gas ra ba sa ba mas pa las e mA/ mu kha na sI rA nim
22a2(mdo): swA hA// / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des/ bdag chas pa'i dus kyi che/ bsrung ba'i srad tu rig sngags kyi rten su bstand pa saHlad pa ni 'di lags so/ 
22a3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya grub pas che dang ldan ban ri'i bu sa bka' ya sang ba/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di thug shig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
22a4(mdo): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten da du 'byung bar rnyed par dag 'o// de bas kyang rigs sngags kyi nyin gyi dgazungs sngags 'di ces rnyed par dga'o// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshes
22a5(mdo): ba 'am ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rub bskal pa sa rgyas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyi sa'i khams kyi khams thams cad kyi dus phra rab rnams bgrang ba 'am// mtha' togs par dus/ 
22a6(mdo): so// rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di'i mthal ni skal pa brgya stong pas kyang brjod par myi nus so// rigs sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstand pa 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rigs sngags kyi
22a7(mdo): rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ kun chub par byos shig/ 'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par ston cig/ yang dag pa rab tu gond cig dang / der bos pas kyang / sems can de dag gi sred pa chung ngu dang / 'bring da
22a8(mdo): chen po srid pa'i rgyu rnams dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa lan dgyod pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyurnams tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bskas pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro bud myed mchis/ 
22b1(mdo): myed pa byed pa'i las kyi sprim pa di'i rgyun mas zang par 'gyur zhing / sngag sa myed pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// zag pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i ba du yang 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems
22b2(mdo): sems dpa' chen po nam ma'a'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba ragrub tung nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// khyod ni ded dpon gcig pu lags/ chos rnams kun la
22b3(mdo): nges pa ste// mthong ba'i gus pa skyes pa yis// bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin // me tog gcig dang bdug pa yis// / de bzhin gshegs la mchod bgyid na / yan lag kun gi mchog ldan pa'i// bshes
22b4(mdo): gnyen sdug pa nye bar 'dzin da// tshogs ni chen po bsdus pa yang / dus gcig tu ni 'dir mdzad pa/ lha rnams thams cad bsngags pa gyid cing // bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin// der mi 'jig rtend
22b5(mdo): 'gon po yis // 'dir ni lan cig khon pa bstan// rtag tu lha phyir na shes rab ldan / bshes gnyen dpal nye bar 'dzin// dpal gyi sa me tog snying po mi/ dpal rnams kun gyis kun tu brgyan// de'i ma
22b6(mdo): shag kya'i dpal zhu bar// bdag cag po nyar bdags pa lags// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs kyi phyogs chan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas// sbyis
22b7(mdo): ma snga dang ldan pa de na/ 'jig rte nang gi khams spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bgyi bar mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog
22b8(mdo): gi snying po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ka zhes la chos kyang stond to// de bzhin gshegs pa des 'dir mAdwags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyi gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par
23a1(mdo): 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi lam 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pas dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngas pa slobs dpa'ade ba sa med/ 
23a2(mdo): par gnas sam/ zhes kyang khu bar mdzad lags sa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi srer gyim tham ga yos rgya rgya pa chos nyan par 'tshal pa dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjem
23a3(mdo): mos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por byed pa danas nams can rim kyis gnas pas gsas par bgyid nasags sas/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas zhing 'din bdud kyi yus dang kwa'i yus macom lags sa
23a4(mdo): dag gi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po de khyodarang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'dzinapa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung bar
23a5(mdo): gzugs sngags 'di la dang sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas 'a po'i rig pa mchim pa'i sbu gu'i gsungs sngags mthu me ba lam yon mebade/ sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu
23a6(mdo): zhi bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa phung po dang skye mched thams cad yongs su zhes par bgyid pa/ chos thams cad rnam par phan par bgyid pa / thabs thams cad yang dag par
23a7(mdo): stong par bgyid pa// byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su myong bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu dang par bgyid pa chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'dug par bgyid pa/ bdud dngapas kyi rgol pa/ 
23b1(mdo): thams cad chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te/ rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstand pa chen po 'di ni bdud
23b2(mdo): rnams tshar gcod par bgyid pa/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/ lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par bgyid/ 
23b3(mdo): pa/ nam mkha' lding rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa myi 'am ci rnams dad par bgyid pa/ lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid pa phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar bgyid pa// rgyal rig
23b4(mdo): rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa bram ze rnams 'jug par bgyid pa / rje rigs rnams rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/ dam dngas rigs nas d+mo dka' bar bgyid pa/ bud myed 'dod chags dang
23b5(mdo): bral bar bgyid pa bud myed sbrum pa bde legs su yongs su bar par bgyid pa/ mang du 'os pa rnams dran par bgyid pa/ rnal 'byord pyod pa rnams mngon ldag rab gyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
23b6(mdo): bgyid pa/ 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang mu ge dang / 'chings dang nad dang / pha rog gi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i chung dang / char pa dang / chu bo dang / drang ba dang / dro ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / phub pa dang / 
23b7(mdo): rgud drung po dang / 'dus te reg par dka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa rton par bgyid pa/ dkon mchog gsum+b+ha g+h+ri gdung rgyun chad par bgyid pa
23b8(mdo): 'thor tha skrag par rnams dbugs 'byind par bgyid pa// zad pa shes pa skyed par bgyid pa// myi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du bgyid pa/ sum pa'i phung po rnam par 'dzinan m+ba rla bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khu 'dor / 
24a1(mdo): bgyid pa mthu me pa lags so// / tad las/ sanan/ a na tA/ g+has rba/ phas na/ man na/ rgan na san N+Dag/ nang ka/ samam chu bas na khaganam sathas sa sun
24a2(mdo): kus na can sa bu ri ka rbaT/ su \u0f7f mnarba/ ka binaH/ kun 'anas/ mas khanaT cabs ldanaH/ lags blanaH/ thug panaT/ his tu blan Ta/ sas la yan sa/ shin gyi bang ko 'u thab sa ta ku rab tun
24a3(mdo): pa ni ra d+hu dra na ma ra dzulu/ ba g+h+nA ma bu te/ an tra ra ba dza ba/ ma ho rag thal/ a trir+tha/ a triT/ a hrIH na ba/ a triH ka/ sa ba ha mA rka tI na ka/ e 'on to// tu kha b+ha ra s+ya sa hA// / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
24a4(mdo): de ba'ini gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos rig pa ma mchis pa'i sbubs shi ga sung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba par yon che ba 'di 'di dar bskur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa
24a5(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // bsam gtam la brtson pa rnams ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mched du lpags pa'i sem sa can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya
24a6(mdo): ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' saHlang to// rigs kyi bu bstan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la rig pa sngo/ 
24a7(mdo): ba'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chad myed pa'i rgya cher stond pa mdzad ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des khyod chas pa'i dus kyi che
24a8(mdo): gam sngags gang dag gis sgrung pa thams cad dad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags snang ba krazhi par byed pa dang / gnyid kyim log par byed pa dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa rgya mthum pa 'byin pa de khyod kyis kyang
24a9(mdo): stond cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bstan par bkyi lags so na/ 
24b1(mdo): tad ya thA/ pro pre ha/ bu bu ra Ta a ra ba/ i la sa ha/ ha Tu ha Tu/ ka ka NA kA/ sha ma ming tra/ tsa kra ba rti/ la ti lo sA ka ra/ ti le/ du 'u Na hi le hi le/ ha pa he/ na ra dzaTe
24b2(mdo): ya ba na mi tre/ kr-i ti mi tre/ ba ra myid tre/ mU r+ya ta mid tre/ kha ka mi tre/ sarbo dza mid tre/ sarba kra ma mid tre/ ma na ba ra mid tre/ d+ha nya sha ra mid tre/ sa ha// / kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
24b3(mdo): po nam mkha' snying pos sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa sdang ba'i sbrul thams cad rang gi gan su dong nas/ gnyid kyis log par gyur da te gang dag bzod pa thob pa rnams dang
24b4(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi log pa/ rnams ni ma gtogs so// srid pa na gang dag sdang ba'i gnod sbyi dan rnams dang / gang dag sdang ba'i lha ma yin rnams dang / zhes bya
24b5(mdo): ba nas/ sdang ba'i nam mazha' lding rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / sdang ba'i myi 'am ci rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / yi dgas rnam sa shes bya ba'i bar dang / sha za rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang
24b6(mdo): srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i ba dang / gang dag spang ba'i lus sbal po rnams shes bya ba'i bar de dag rang gi gnas su do nas pa gnyid kyis log par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bayod pa zab pa rnams dang / 
24b7(mdo): kyi log pa rnamasa'i mi gtogs so// gang dag sdang ba'i phyi gsu sums can dang / grub pa dang / phan tshun gyi mthun pa dang / rtag tu rno ba pyod pa dang / 'jig rten ma rol kyis 'jigs par gyilta ba dang / mtshams byed
24b8(mdo): pa byed pa dang / ram pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / 'phags pa la bsrur ba 'debs pa dang / myi dge ba'i la ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang drang bzhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di thos pas ma
25a1(mdo): cad mchog tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / khrod myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / myi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / chos la
25a2(mdo): dmyigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / 'jig rten pha rol gi gri tshis dra ldan pa dag dang / dkon mchog gsum la lhag par gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / chos la dmyigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang
25a3(mdo): zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu gnas par gyur to// gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po nges bdag chas pa'i che/ bsrung ba'i srad du spang ba zhi
25a4(mdo): bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags pa lad pa ni 'di lags so// ded de de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo ny+tsa 'gal gyi dbu la bka' sa la pa/ me'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis sdang ba zhihA/ 
25a5(mdo): bgyid pa/ gnyid kyis log par byedad pa'i gzungs sngags dpyi gas pa myed pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa rgyu mthun pa 'di thug shigamo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa/ 
25a6(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dga'o// de bas kyang snang bzhi bar byed pa / gnyid kyil log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa 'di rnyed
25a7(mdo): pabar dag 'o// me'u 'gas kyi bu sdang bzhi bar byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa 'di ma bskas pa brgya stong du sas gzhan gyi byed par bstan kyang / lha rang bcas pa'i 'jig cend dang / gar byang chub sems dpa' sol
25b1(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yim zhing / sems cad yongs su smyin par byed pa'i snying rje chen po yang thob par byed pa'o// me'u 'gal gyi bu de lta bas na
25b2(mdo): sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags 'di khrung shig/ dus dus su sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu storang cig/ sems can gang dag nyan par byed pa de dag kyang thos pa
25b3(mdo): tsam gyis yon tan dang phar yon mang po thob par 'gyur ro// khro ba mang pos kyi 'dod pa myong bar 'gyur ya / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnams myed par 'gyur ro// myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// 'khong ba'i spyor pa
25b4(mdo): po rnam par shes par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i ma pa mang po bskyed par/ 'gyur ro// bsod nams mang po so sor 'dzind par byed do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po la stend par byed do// sten par byed
25b5(mdo): bsnyen bkur byed do// de nas de dag tha ma byed pa yang dag par rjod pa pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// le'u 'gas kyi du gzungs sngags 'di mo chos kyi mar me 'bar bar byed pa dkon
25b6(mdo): mchog gsum gyi gdung gyi 'chad par byed pa yin no// 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i zhing po 'i le'u las gzungs grags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de sa bcom ldan 'das kyis po nya bzhi po de dag dang / 
25b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la yang bka' saHla pa// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyis gnas par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
25b8(mdo): dpa' chen po de dag 'khor dang bcas te/ gnas ji lta pa bzhin du bskyil lo krung kyis 'khod nas/ ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bzod pa'i gzungs la snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu bsgoms pa dag gis snyoms par zhug pa/ 
26a1(mdo): snyoms par zhugs pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na 'bru mar gyi mar bye bzhin no// kha cig gi ni dpe ra zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi 'od bzhin pa'i bar du'o// yang de/ 
26a2(mdo): 'i che tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko 'u di r+ya 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bdag gis zhu rdzi lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa gzu
26a3(mdo): sngags bzhi po thams cad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stond par mdzad pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi zhi'i myi mjed du ji ltar lpags pa'i sems can rnams nyan par byed pa dang / the tsom thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang
26a4(mdo): chos thams cad snang ba thob pa dang / ltad mo dang bral ba dang / som nyi las rgal cing the tsom las rgas par 'gyur ba dang/ myur tu ste dan byed par 'jug pa dang / log par gyi ltung ba'i chos can dang
26a5(mdo): mthor me la gnam par 'byung ba/ de lta bu zhu bar bya'onam man de nas me dang ldan shes ko 'drin com ldan 'das gas gas su mas so myang ba bdud nam ca kyi smra bar 'dug no// 
26a6(mdo): dem mam ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa pa shes / den nas ga' da/ na didi dashenas pas khyod na bcub 'dod dpa gsos dpa/ btsun pa com ldan 'das gas te #
26a7(mdo): srung bsta dad pa'i mang du slebs byen/ bdun pa de bzhi gshegs pa la bdag cu ba la zhos zhus nam na/ mam ldan 'das kyis bgams sa / gan di de bzhin gshegs pa sa com pa yang dag
26a8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lo skyed gang dang gang 'dod pa gus shig dang / ngas zhu ba zlas pa de dang ni sum sa slar bas/ jis pa ska dpa bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mngon sum tu 'gyur ba ltang/ khyod kyi sems rangs par rgya
26b1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u din n+yas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dag gi zla ni sred pa'o/ zla ni sred pa'o zhes gsungs lags na ji tsam gyis de
26b2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa gang zag gi zla sred pa lags par 'dogs pas 'dogs par mdzad lags// ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes pa'i zla sred pa'i yun ring por yang dang yang mAng+galA le nad par byed do zhes gsungs
26b3(mdo): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa ko'u din n+ya gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / dus dang 'tsham par zhu zhus pa legs so legs so// ko'u
