302a1(mdo): barbasad pa/ zang zing sbyin pa sbyin pa 'khor lo ldan pa// / mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas/ 'dod/ lnga dag ni spangs te/ sems can kun la phan pa bde byed/ sems can kun la bde lngar gyi
302a2(mdo): rnam smin 'bras bu re phyir ma yin// sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang // yang dag bsod nams zhing du deng 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang // 'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas na// 'phags dag gis phyag rgyas ma btab
302a3(mdo): ma nges pa'i tshogs la gnas 'gyur// sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po chung yang // 'dod pa lnga la myi gnas pa ni// nyan tho/ ga/ dang rang rgyal ba'i// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// de bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs pa// brtag
302a4(mdo): tu rnam dag sbyin byed cing // sems can kun la bde ba byas na// yang da ka bsod nam/ de 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyind pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam
302a5(mdo): pa bcu yod de/ byang chub sem pa dpa'ada' chen po chos kyi sbyid/ parnayod de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo// de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems
302a6(mdo): bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ myur du nyi ma'i smon ma mi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shinang tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang
302a7(mdo): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ce
302a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa das pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i nges pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i das pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos
302b1(mdo): rang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / gnyis su myed pa'i chos rnams te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem
302b2(mdo): rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams ji nus su gzungs su 'dzind cing yid la byed do// rab tu rtog go// mthar khong du chud par byed cing // gzhan dag la yang ni rigs
302b3(mdo): pad+ma stond par byed do// dam chos stond pa'i chen phra dog myed pa'i sems dang / ser sna myed pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal byed pa'i sems dpa rnyed pa phyi re ba'i sems dang / gzhan gi kyi re ba'i sems dang / 
302b4(mdo): pasr-i skye sang dang bcas pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / dbyams pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems su bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni/ nyan thos kyi
302b5(mdo): chos ston cing 'chad de/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos sas/ theg pa skyed pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ci gang bkal ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi then
302b6(mdo): chos s+ho na thos kyi theg pa mas ga pa na pa ma yin pa dang / badzin pa'i ga gas / ga pa rna ma sa bsodadakyi/ 
302b7(mdo): rgyas kyi mig pa'i maman ma yin pa dang / sems cad kyi dbang po dang / khyod drismra ba bzhin du sa pa'i spyos sor kyi ba dang / srod dus srung bas sodang te// gang pon pa
303a1(mdo): sa nan tan byos shig ces skul ba'i skabs ni yod do// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gyod
303a2(mdo): pa la nan tan gyis shig ces skul ba'i skabs kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa'i dam pa'i cho mi chung ngu na/ tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam la yang / shin
303a3(mdo): tu dang cing bkur sti byed kyi/ de la 'phya ba 'am/ sku rang pa 'am/ bgegs sam/ bar chad myi byed de/ chos bstan pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams la
303a4(mdo): nad pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / gang 'chad pa'i chos rnams la sman babang po dang / 'dra bar 'du shes shing / 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bcad de/ re ba myed pas ngas pa'i
303a5(mdo): chos ston to// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub pa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po mas kyi sbyin pa/ gos chen pa'i 'khor lo// rnam pa 'acu zhes bya/ 
303a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kapa 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su bas lang te/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang thob cing nyan thos
303a7(mdo): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shinang tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang
303b1(mdo): sa cad das mas kyi sbyin pa gyong ga // thod pa'i theg pa gsapa gan das ngas bya
303b2(mdo): ba nas des srur gyi 'gyur/ dbang po ngadas pa spong 'dzi dam mdzis pa gron pagyi/ byin dag sams // tha ma sa la sa
303b3(mdo): sa/ de dang dal pa ston ma su bar byed/ na ma myod pagang gas/ theg pa nas sa byams bya bas na theg pa
304a1(mdo): bshad par bya// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go chen po li 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga
304a2(mdo): 'khor lo de dang ldan na// thog sa soms bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por
304a3(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go ma chen po'i 'khor lo zhen
304a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa nas pa gnyis ste/ thun mong ba dang / thun mong ba ma yin no// de la daji ltar na// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i
304a5(mdo): 'khor lo thun mong ba gang zhes/ 'ang khyim na gnas pa dag na/ bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen pa'i tshul khrims sdom pa blangs pa 'am/ yang na rab tu byung ba la so sor 'a rad pa'i rgyas khrims kyis
304a6(mdo): bzhen pa thogs pa sa/ sdos pa 'ang dang mo sa ba dad pa'i dum mas 'di / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyam chis sa rnam par dag pa'i 'tho nu mang ba nye// nyan thom dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang dus
304a7(mdo): ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis sems canamams cad kun byon mongs pacod pa ra sa/ log pam lta ba sems pa ras/ sas kyi sgrib pa dang
304a8(mdo): 'khor ba las grol bar gyi 'gyur te/ go mchen ma yi 'amams zhes kyang ci bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi masod nams kyi ning
304b1(mdo): yang dag par yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims rnam par dag gago cha chen po'i thun mong ba yin zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam/ 
304b2(mdo): pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod pa myed pa'i sems dang / khon du 'dzind pa myed pa'i sems kyis// rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / byams pa dang
304b3(mdo): zhe sdang dang / 'phon 'grus dang / le lo can rab 'brings kun la/ bye brag myi 'byed pa'i sems dang / khyad par myed pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo // khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad
304b4(mdo): la zhe sdang myed pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa dang / ngan par gyod / pa myed pas tshul khri la srung ngo // srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog pa myed pas tshul
304b5(mdo): khrims yongs su srung ngo // 'dod pa'i khams sa kyi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // srid pa gsus kyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la rnam par rtog pa byed pa'i khams la myi gnas par
304b6(mdo): tshul khrims srung ngo // srid pa'i 'bras bu'i rnam par sbyin pa thams cad la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // rnyed pa dang myi rnyed pa la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // 'du byed rnams la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung / 
304b7(mdo): da da mtho da da na med nyi nas da kog ma man ca ga na nga ga da pa'i khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa la yongs su bsal te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o
304b8(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las dad rgya shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa tha
305a1(mdo): thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' saHlad pa
305a2(mdo): khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pade/ rab byung so sor tha rad pa'i tshul khrims// / theg pa gnyis dang thun mong yin te// byang chub chen po zhes ni myi bya// / mkhas pa stong pa nyid chos bsgoms pa// 'jig rten kun la/ 
305a3(mdo): myi rten myi gnas// srid pa kun la gnas ma yin par// rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // mtshan ma spong ba'i tshul khrims dag ni/ chags pa myed de zag pa kun myed// tshul khrims 'di ltar srung ba dag/ 
305a4(mdo): ni// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhe bya// rigs kyi bu gzhan/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i go cha'i 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dang / 
305a5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po ga pa 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma ses sa bskyed nas 'dod pa la yongs su gsal te/ nyan thos dang rangs ngas rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang rang / 
305a6(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji
305a7(mdo): ltar na bzod pa'i gos chen po li 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi phu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i mtshas nyid gnyis te/ gang zhes/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la 'i ster na byang chub sems dang
305a8(mdo): 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa zhe na/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa'i ste/ sems can la dmyigs pa yind pa dang bcas pa'i mtshan ma dang bcas// rnam par smyin pa'i 'bras bu la brten pa/ bsod nams kyi las
305b1(mdo): mi brten te/ bzod par byed pa'o// gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya la brten nas bzod par byed do// 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ji myi snyam pa' myed pa'i bzod pa'o// 
305b2(mdo): mthu zhen pa'i bzod pa'i sems can gtang ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yo sgyur bcas pa'i bzod pa dang / pha rol la 'dran pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don myi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di dag
305b3(mdo): ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la bstsogs pa dang / thun mong pa ma yin gyi go ca chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o des ji ltar na byang chub sems
305b4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
305b5(mdo): bzod pa go ca chen po'i khor lo zhe na/ zag pa myed pa'i bzod pa/ ste/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don kyi phyir chags pa myed pa
305b6(mdo): bzod pa dang / bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang tshig tu smra ba dang rgyu dang mtshan ma dang / yi ge dang sma dang / skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa khyod do// bzod pa 'di bsgos
305b7(mdo): bas kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang / skal ba rnam gsum dang / mtshan nyid gsum dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang // 'du byed rnam gsum dang / myi dge ba'i zha ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang / bdud
305b8(mdo): rnam bzhi dang nye bar len pa bzhi dang / lus kyi 'dud pa rnam bzhi las stsogs pa yongs su bcad pas/ bzod pa'i bsgoms pa'i tshe/ sems dang yid rab tu zhi bas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pA
306a1(mdo): go ca chen po'i bzod pa'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga nas
306a2(mdo): yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur

306a4(mdo): bka' maHyad pa/ bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ mtshan mar bas dang mtshan ma myed pa/ mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa'i chags yod mkhas pa dag ni de la myi stod/ 'du byed nam gsum phung po khams
306a5(mdo): dang / skye mched la brten bzod pa bsgom pa/ de ni zag bcas bzod/ pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin/ phyin ci log pa rnam bzhi bsal nas/ chags pa myed pa'i bzod pa bsgom zhing
306a6(mdo): 'du byed rnam gsum dag zhin/ 'thod pa 'di la thams cad stong 'gyur/ 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing / rtog pa thams cad yongs spangs te/ sems ni nam mkha' 'dra bar mnyam pa/ bzod pa 'di la thams cad
306a7(mdo): bstod 'gyur// thams cad chos la ro gcig mthun par/ stong pa mtshan ma myed pa'i zhi ba/ sems ni mi la 'ang myi chags/ bzod pa 'di ni phan yon che 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
306a8(mdo): chen po'i be tshon 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khob lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po li 'khor lo de dang ldan pa/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsalnga te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
306b1(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na bcos 'grus kyis
306b2(mdo): ca chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rtend dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// gsum gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las/

306b5(mdo): 'brus 'di ni nyen thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la bsdogs pa dang bathun mong ba yin te/ gos chen po 'i 'khor lo zhes kyi bya/ byang chu nye ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang kyi bya / nyam thos
306b6(mdo): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad
306b7(mdo): pa'i brtson 'grus kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis/ nyon mongs pa'i las dang sdug bsngal thams cad seld pa ste/ brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa zag pa myed pa/ nye bar
306b8(mdo): lend pa byed pa'ang chen dang gnas myed pa/ brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / ngan pa'i tshul khrims pas dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang
307a1(mdo): tham kun la myi 'byed pa'i sems dang / bye brag myed pa'i 'du shes kyis shi nang tu 'bad pa'i bcom 'grus mos so// khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dmyigs pa myed pas/ 
307a2(mdo): bya ba'i las byed de/ smra ba dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la myi gnas pa'i sems kyis shind tu 'bad pa'i bcom 'grus chom mo// khams dang skye mched la rnam par rtog pa myed pas shi nad tu 'bad pa'i
307a3(mdo): brtson 'grus pom ste/ 'dod pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs dang 'dod pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs byed pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i
307a4(mdo): 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / srid pa'i rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras/ bu thams cad la myi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang // rnyed pa dadang ma rnyed pa kun la myi gnas pa'i 'bad ba'i 'artson 'grus dang
307a5(mdo): 'du byed rnams la myi gnas pa'i bcom 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi las kyi dngos po thams cad gsum la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson lus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldam pa'i bsod nams kyi

307a7(mdo): dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go tsa chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ba nyon 'grus kyi go cha chen po li 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems skyed
307a8(mdo): pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam pa snga bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nad tu 'das te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing
307b1(mdo): du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka
307b2(mdo): \u0f7flad pa / dbang po drug la shi nang tu chags pa'i// bus pa chu bo lngas ni khyer ba/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bcom yang // mkhas pa rnams kyis de la spyod 'gyur// sems can dmyigs shing zag dang bcas

307b5(mdo): 'gyur ba/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' se dpa' chen po/ 'dzi/ ka rten khyod kyang chu zla bzhin te// 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ 'i mthar phyin// 'khor lo 'di yis yongs su bcom pa// skye
307b6(mdo): ba'i kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bya ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi ko tsa chen po'i 'kho ra lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kang 'khor

307b9(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las/ 'das pa'o// de lang ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rtend gi bsam gtan zhe na// byang
308a1(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas/ bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / khams la gnas nas bsam gtan skom pa dang / skye mched la gnas nas/ bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i
308a2(mdo): khams la gnas nas ma bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams la gnas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sdom pa
308a3(mdo): gsum la gnas nas/ bas gtan bsgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la gnas rnam bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / yang dag par spong sa 'an
308a4(mdo): la gnas nas pas gtan bsgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkab pa bzhi ngal gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / dbang po lnga gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / stobs lnga la gnas nas bsam
308a5(mdo): gtam bsgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun la gnas nas bsam gtas bsgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sa'i khams pa
308a6(mdo): gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / kye'i khral gam nA bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rlung gi khams la gnas nas bsam gtam bsgom pa dang / nam mkha'i sa
308a7(mdo): la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas sam gtan pasam gzhan bsgom pa dang / bde ba tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i chong pa
308a8(mdo): ma gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma 'tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgos pa dang / nam mkhal ma thal sas skye mched la gnas nas pasam gtan bsgom pa dang / 
308b1(mdo): rnam shes mthal las skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la gnas nas
308b2(mdo): bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di na gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas pas rten 'asgo 'dra/ 'du shes chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtad bsgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po la/ 
308b3(mdo): gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad myed pa la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan de dag zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar lend pa dang bcas// chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
308b4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o// bsam gtan 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong pa zhes bya'o// go ca chen po 'khor lo/ 
308b5(mdo): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes myi byaste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhi bdag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i
308b6(mdo): 'dzag rter las 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom ba dang / skye
308b7(mdo): mched dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams dang bral bar
308b8(mdo): bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan
309a1(mdo): bsgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bur bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / dbang po dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang
309a2(mdo): stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral ba bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sa'i kham
309a3(mdo): dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang bral ba bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / kye'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / na
309a4(mdo): mkha'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rnam pa shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bas rnyen 'go ban/ bde bar tshor ba dang / dbral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sdug bsngams bral ba
309a5(mdo): bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sdug bsngal par yang ma yin/ bde pa yang ma yin pa dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dpya/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom
309a6(mdo): ba dang / nas shes ma pa la yas su mchod dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgos pa dang / cung bad byed pa'i skyes ched dang bral bar bsam gtas pa sgom pa dang / 'du shes byed 'du shes khyed byin skye mched dang zas par rngam/ 
309a7(mdo): gtan bsgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'jig rten pa rlo ma dang thas par gsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po
309a8(mdo): dang bral bar bsas gtan bsgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad myed pa dang bral par bsam gtan sa sgos pa dang bamam gtan 'do 'phags pa'i 'od ze chen po bskyed pa zag pa myed pa// nye bar mend pa byed pa
309b1(mdo): chags pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi ko cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam
309b2(mdo): gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khob lo 'di dang ldan na / thog pa sems bskyed pa nas// 'dod pa lnga yongs su bas yad te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dparang sangs rgyas dzes
309b3(mdo): cad las shind tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhib du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen
309b4(mdo): bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka las ma med pa// bdag gi khub ldi spong ba'i phyir ni/ myig dang bcas pa'i tipe 'dzin skom ste
309b5(mdo): bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod// yang dag mkhas pa'i/ mtshan nyid ma yin// snod la brten cing brtog dang bcas pa/ rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin da bsgom yang / tshu rol pha rol su
309b6(mdo): sa gnas na/ sems can dag la phad byed myin// sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir// ting 'dzind bsgom zhing zhur lci spong zhi pa/ kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba/ 'di ni yang dag mkhas pa'i
309b7(mdo): mtshan nyid/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed phyir// myi dmyigs pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom ste/ 'dod pa'i spyod pa thams cad bcod pa/ 'di ni blo gros chen po zhes bya// srid pa bcings pa thams cad bkol
309b8(mdo): 'jigs pa myed pa'i grong du gzung phyir/ rab tu zhi ba'i tipe 'dzin bsgom phyir/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po// / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
310a1(mdo): dpa' ben pa shes pa kyag tan ca 'am ga zhes bya'i yang / kyang tu 'i sems da 'a nga dang / nas thams bskyed dod pa sa sol thams
310a2(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las zhind tu 'das ga pa/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas sems cad kyi bsod mam kyi mi chen po 'gyu ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yin pa rgyathams cad kyis
310a3(mdo): mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid ra 'gyur ro// de la ji la na shes ra'i kon chen po'i 'khor lo zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems da'a'i shes rab la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten
310a4(mdo): las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na/ byang chu byed pa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab cen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang / glegs pam tu 'bri ba dang / 
310a5(mdo): nyan pa dang / pha ro lad la bsnyen cing 'chan pa 'ang zhig la brten te// kyi sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa seld par 'dod pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi zhes rab kyi sgron ma 'byung ba'i phyir/ de
310a6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pas bstan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la zhin da tu 'bang ba'i brtsom 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / thegs pas tu 'brib dang / ka' ma dag la rgyas par bstod cing 'chang pa
310a7(mdo): dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi nan tan byed pa dang // na bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang / 'dod pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'bri ba dang / gzhan la ya
310a8(mdo): rgyas par bston cing / 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'ason 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/ 'phags pa zag pa myed pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du ga to/ 
310a9(mdo): phyi bzhin gshegs pas bas dang pa'i nga sangs rgyas kyi rig pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'dod pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs pam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la stodang cipa 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du byed do// 
310b1(mdo): pa'i rnam par grol ba ma yin// rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa ma yin te/ brtag tu blta ba dang bcas pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed do// de ltar lend pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang
310b2(mdo): bcas pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o// shes rab de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mo pa yin te/ go che chen po'i 'khor lo zhes myi bya/ de la byang chub sems dpal sos
310b3(mdo): dpa' chen po zhes kyang kyi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ce na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs
310b4(mdo): byang chub kyi lam la brtson 'grus nan tan byed pa na/ ci nus su the dag pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam tu 'bri ba dang / gzhan dag la brgyas par bston
310b5(mdo): cing 'chad kyang de la dmyigs su myed pa'i sbyor ba la gnas te/ myi g.yo ba dang / myi brtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / nam mkha'alta bu'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / 'phel ba dang
310b6(mdo): 'grib pa myed pa'i sems dang / chags pa myed pa'i sems dang / skye ba dang 'gog pa myed pa'i sems dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang / yang dag
310b7(mdo): pa'i 'tho' sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang nga bdag myed pa'i sems dang / rnam par myi rtog pa'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang / 
310b8(mdo): 'jig pa myed pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang / myi gnas pa myi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo glos la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'di ni lend pa myed la chags/ 
311a1(mdo): pa myed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhes rab kyi go ma chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go ma chen po'i/ 
311a2(mdo): 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dparang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las gnad tu 'das shing / 
311a3(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub seMs
311a4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa/ ko tsa chen po'i/ 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kad 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na// thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga
311a5(mdo): yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shind tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang
311a6(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i goca chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang
311a7(mdo): thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji lar na bya chub mos da'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag
311a8(mdo): gi don nam gzhan gyi don nam gnyi ga'i don la/ bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing / bzo' dang spu ral rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 
311b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / pha dang ma dang / nad pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang / brten myed pa dang / gnod pa mang pos
311b2(mdo): sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na// gnad tu thabs mkhas pas bsgrol zhing / smra ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su sbyin par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag theg pa chen po la
311b3(mdo): gnas pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sas rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma sbyin pa la/ shin tu phra la zab pa dam pa'i tshe
311b4(mdo): bston te/ slob tu gzhug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bsam sa/ tan la nan tan byed du gzhug go// gzhan yang don dam pa'i dang den pa bstand te/ nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / phyind ci log
311b5(mdo): bzhi las bzla zhing myi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya// pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
311b6(mdo): spong ba bzhi dpang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam
311b7(mdo): dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes yongs su sbyin byed do// sems can gang khye dang grags pa dang / long spyod la chags te dbang po rgod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma sbyind pa
311b8(mdo): la ni mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo klog pa dang / 'don pa byed tu gzhug pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las/ gzhan pa rnam par grol ba dang / 'dun pa'i rgyug lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste/ yongs su
312a1(mdo): sbyin par byed do/ sems can gang gtum pa gyi nges pa'i rang bzhin can la/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi srog tu skul pa dang / sems can gang ne sdang can bzod pa slob par skul pa dang / sems can gang
312a2(mdo): le lo can la ni brtson 'grus sob tu stsal pa dang / sems can gang sems g.yeng ba yin pa la ni/ bsam gtan bsgom par bskul ba dang / sems can gang 'chal ba'i shes rab can la ni/ yang dag pa'i chos bston pa/ 
312a3(mdo): pas/ bka' lung ba 'a sprod cing lung 'bog pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su sbyin byed do// sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing / myi gnas pa dang / myi spyod pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la
312a4(mdo): skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / dgel bsnyen pa'i sdom pa bslab pa dang / dge' bsnyen gyi sdom pa bslab pas yongs su sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang bzo dang stsacal rnam pa sa tshogs/ 
312a5(mdo): kyi gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas yongs su smin par byed do// de la rtso gas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thab sa mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo // 
312a6(mdo): de ltar yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo dang sgyu tshal gyi las gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i dpyod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang / ston pa gzhan la bzhugs pa thams cad 'dul ba de la ni byang chub
312a7(mdo): sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs khas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thum mong ba yin te sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur da thabs mkhas pa spyong pa'i gnas su gyur da pa/ shin tu/ 
312a8(mdo): thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas 'di ni nyan thos dpang nga sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi thams cad gnas rgyur gyu pa thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur da pa/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa spun gyis grub ma
312b1(mdo): rtog pa myed pa ldog pa myed pa'i chos su gyu ra pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang stond pa mkhas pa la myi rten dge'i bla zhes gnyen la myi ltos par 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa nan tan byed pa ni/ byang chub sems
312b2(mdo): dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan song du lung bar gyur ro// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la zhol zhing gnas par yang myi nus la thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang
312b3(mdo): dag ya pa ma yin no// gnad tu thabs myi mkhas pa'i sems can gyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i khyad par yang myi zhes yang/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa la yang mongs par gyu rad pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
312b4(mdo): dang / theg pa chen po'i sngon ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dbyang po rum sbyin pa la theg pa chen por stond pa dang / slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go// gang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur
312b5(mdo): pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos bstond pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go// gang rang
312b6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyu rad pa'i sems can ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos bstond cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob/ nan tan byed du bcug go// gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i
312b7(mdo): sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la bde ba dang dga' bar bston te/ 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par myi ston to// gzhan yang shi nad tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas/ sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga'
312b8(mdo): pa nas de bzhin du log par blta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la ni shi nad tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos pa stond te/ de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ pha rol tu skye zhing stug bsngal gi 'bras bu rnam pa
313a1(mdo): rnam par skyed pa sa skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa kyi dge 'anams ston tsa// gnanas can nad na mams sunas na sa rtsom pos// sems cad gang rgyal khrims spang ba thos pa la ni sbyin pasod
313a2(mdo): bcug go// sems can gang bzod pa bsgom par mos pa la ni/ bzod pa bsgom par stond cing / tshul khrims bsrung du bcug go// sems can gang brtson 'grus bsgom par mos pa la ni spong ba stond cing bzod pa sbyor du
313a3(mdo): bcug go// gang bsam gtan bsgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong ba stond cing bcom 'grus la nan tan byed du bcug go// sems can gang shes rab bsgom pa ma mos pa la ni/ shes rab bsgom pa stond cing / 
313a4(mdo): bsam gtan bsgom du bcug go// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'ji ga rtend thabs mkhas pa la/ rmongs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na du sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed myi nus te/ seMs
313a5(mdo): thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs par gyur te// thabs mkhas pa 'di/ ni dmyigs pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i/ 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar 'jig rten gri
313a6(mdo): thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang hUM na mong ma yin te/ go ca chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang myi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas/ 
313a7(mdo): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la 'i lta na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ shinang tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhes/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag mngon
313a8(mdo): btang ste// gzhan kyi don skur byed pas bzo dang sgrams rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par smon pas/ yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 
313b1(mdo): pha dngas la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa dang / nad pa dang / phongs pa dang / nyam zag pa dang / mgon dang / skyabs myed pa dang / shind tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis slol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po
313b2(mdo): rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su sbyin par byed de/ ci la mos pa dang / dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos stond to// gzhan yang rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa ning / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa slob
313b3(mdo): cing / nan tan byed par skul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni/ theg pa chen po slob cing / nan tan byed par bskul pa dang / gal te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa la ni// 'khor ba'i sdug
313b4(mdo): bsngal gyi chos kyis stond cing 'khor bas skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar sgrol lo// sems can gang srog gcod pa la mo/ rnas pa nas/ log par lta ba'i bar du chags pa la ni/ dbang po dang / 
313b5(mdo): rang bzhin ji lta bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos stond pa dang / 'a ga rten 'di nas 'chi 'phos nas/ pha rold kyi sdug bsngal pa'i 'bras bu myong ba bstan te/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jig
313b6(mdo): pa dang / skyo ba stonang to// kha cig la mi nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / ldan pa'i chos ston to// kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos stond to// kha cig la ni bla na myed pa'i theg pa'i chos yang dag par ston te/ 
313b7(mdo): kha cig gis slob tu 'jug go// sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par gyu rad pa rnams la ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mchog bsrung bar stond pa dang / de bzhin du rgyas par sems can gang bsam gtan la mos par gyur
313b8(mdo): pa la ni/ zag pa myed pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang / shes rab bra na myed pa stond cing nan tan byed du bcug ste/ shi nad tu thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmyigs pa myed pa dang / chags pa myed pa ste
314a1(mdo): 'dim byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa 'igol chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyo su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thab pa mkhas pa'i gos chen po'i 'kho tsho 'di/ 
314a2(mdo): dang ldan na/ bog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nad tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang
314a3(mdo): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dod de
314a4(mdo): gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bca de na bka' sa la pa shes rab nan tan nam gnyis ste/ 'jig rten bcas dang / byed 'jig rten 'das/ chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas/ chags myed
314a5(mdo): de ni 'jig rten 'das/ shin tu gams pa 'am nan kyad ni/ byad ranam pa gnyis sa gnam/ dbyigs pa yod pa 'jig rte bas/ dmyigs myed de ni 'jig rten 'das/ gang nig then
314a6(mdo): gcig so dpa// de ni legs pa chos ston gyin/ bdag kyang songs sa myi spyod na/ gzha gyi yo tugam sa zar 'gyur/ gcig tu phyi gsems cams/ theg pa gsum ni byos so das/ de ni ga'i mug mongs pa
314a7(mdo): bying chub chen po de ma yin/ sheg pa gsum la 'dug sgo 'di yang dag pa'i chom 'dodas// 'khor ba sgornam pa sgo dang pa mkhas pa'i rang bdin ma yin// brtsegs gcig rloms rab btags te/ 'dod dang
314a8(mdo): mos pa bzhin du sto nga/ 'di mi gi rang tu thabs mkhas pas/ mkhas pa rnams kyis de la bsngags/ sems can sdig pa dag khyod kyang / theg pa gsum gyi sdong 'gyur ma/ dbang po'i snong bzhin chos bstan te/ 
314b1(mdo): sdig pa kum sas sgrol bar byed/ rigs kyi stezhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgo chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ 
314b2(mdo): ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nad tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos
314b3(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byams pa chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ chos la/ 
314b4(mdo): dmyigs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can dmyigs pa'i byams pa'o// chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ byams pa chen po'i ko cha che nu po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa
314b5(mdo): ni byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ se mas can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste// nyan thos dang rang
314b6(mdo): sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can la dmyigs pa'i bzod pa la nan tan byed pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas zhi bdag zhi ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'das pa dang
314b7(mdo): bdag bsgrib pa bsal ba dang / bdag gi nyon mongs pa'i gcad pa'i phyir gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams bas/ brtson 'grus nan tan byed pa ma yin no// de bas na byams pa 'di
314b8(mdo): byams pa chen po zhes myi bya'o// go cha chen po ma yin no// chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang thun mong ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dra zhig
315a1(mdo): gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems cadan thams cad la phan pa dang // bde ba'i don tu brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas chos la dmyigs pa'i byas pa 'dis
315a2(mdo): nan tan byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'dra ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir shi nang tu 'bad pa'i 'tshon 'grus kyis chos
315a3(mdo): la dmyigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed do// de ban byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa la nan byed pa ni phung po la myi gnas/ 
315a4(mdo): skye mched la myi gnas/ khams la myi gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag rnams la myi gnas pa nas/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi lam gyi du myi gnas so// 'dod pa'i khams la myi gnas// gzugs
315a5(mdo): kyi khams la myi gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i khams la myi gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la myi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la myi gnas tshu rol gyi mu la myi gnas/ pha rol kyi mu la myi gnas/ dmyig
315a6(mdo): pa la myi gnas/ myi dmyigs pa la myi gnas te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la myi dmyigs pa'i/ byams pa la nan tan byed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shi nad tu
315a7(mdo): 'das te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po li 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / byams pa chen po la'i khor lo 'di dang
315a8(mdo): ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsald te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa zhes cad
315b1(mdo): khyim mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnye bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di ngag gams par bzlas par phyir/ rigs su 'acad de bka' sa 'das / nyan thos dang ni nga rgyas lang / sems can
315b2(mdo): dgas pa'i byams bcom pa// sems sa dmyigs pa skyon 'chang zhing // bdag la mun pa'i don phyir thos// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni// sems can thams cad kun gyi phyir// kun mongam yin byams chen
315b3(mdo): bsgoms// bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs// dris bcu gsum rab spangs nas/ byang chub chen por gzhol bar byed// chos la dmyigs pa'i byams bsgoms ma// bsod nams zhing grub ring ba byin// bcu
315b4(mdo): gsum stobs e bder gnas ma/ sems can kun las shind tu 'ang dgas/ ji skar seng ge'i rgyal po de/ ri dgas kun las 'phags/ da pa bzhin/ bcu gsum dgra rnams shinang tu bdul da/ bdag tu
315b5(mdo): chad pa'i mthar 'dzind spangs// sems la cis kyang myi gos na/ myur du byang chub chen po 'thob// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i gi chen po'i
315b6(mdo): 'khor lo yod deg/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo/ 'di dang ldan na// thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsalang te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nad tu 'das
315b7(mdo): ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// 
315b8(mdo): de ji ltar na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje la khyod kyi/ sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po bskyed pa ma yin no// byang chub
316a1(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo bdag 'ba' zhig la phan pa dang bde ba'i dzid kyi phyi/ snying rje chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po bskyed do// 
316a2(mdo): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po la 'khor long ldan pas// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la I 'das pa nyan thos dang rab sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / 
316a3(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / 
316a4(mdo): bde ba'i don gyi phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can / dngas su sbyin par byed de/ snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad rdul phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba ni
316a5(mdo): 'di sa ste/ rin mo che dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / theg pa dang / bran dang / las byed pa'i phyi dang / yul dang / srid dang / du pa/ chung ma dang / lus dang / srog gi bar du yongs su gtong ba la/ 
316a6(mdo): serasA myed de/ myi dmyigs pa'i spyod pa la sbyor bas 'dul ba'i sems yod par myi mthong / sbyin pa byed par gyi mthong bded par myi mthong / nor gyi dngos por gyi mthong / sbyin pa gyod par myi mthong / sbyin pa byas pa'i
316a7(mdo): 'bras bu myi mthong ba nas / myi dmyigs pa'i bar du yang myi ma 'ong ste/ de lta bu'i snying rje chen po gyod de// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don kyi phyir ngag snyan pa dang / don bsgrub pa dang / don mthun pas kyi
316a8(mdo): dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du myi dmyigs pa yang myi mthong ba'i bar tu/ de dang des sangs rgyas par ston da cing 'chang ngo // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i 'dul ba'i sems dang / 
316b1(mdo): tu zhi ba'i sems dang / chad myed pa'i sems dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i sems kyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba skyed pa dang / myi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po 'i/ 
316b2(mdo): 'khor lo 'dis sdong du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyid par byed pa la skye ba myed do// de ltar na byang chub sems/ dpa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thos
316b3(mdo): cad dang thun mong ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po la 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bsal te/ byang chub sems dang/ 
316b4(mdo): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas tham sa cad las shind tu 'das shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams da kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
316b5(mdo): kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen pa kur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' saHlad pa// shis
316b6(mdo): tu bab mo dam pa'i chos dag/ snying rje chen po'i gzhing ni deng 'gyur/ sha nid tu dpag dkal nam mkha' 'dra ste// gnas pa myed de gzugs kyang myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po// yon tan chen po dpa ni
316b7(mdo): ldan te// sems can rnam par gral bar byed dang // byang chub sems dpa' snyang rdza spyad pa// 'khar ba'i rgya mtsho skyams par byed da// nyan pas theg pa la 'khar rnams dang na// rang rgyal zag pa sbyar bas mA yan// 'dad chags
316b8(mdo): zhe sdang gta mug sems can/ rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen po// dbang po 'jig rten 'da' bar des 'gyur/ 'gon dang skyabs myed sems can dag na/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rtog pas bcings pa/ snying rje chen po'i chus bkrus te/ 
317a1(mdo): sems can rnam par grol bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje bskyed pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skyems par byed de/ nyin mos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni/ rang rgyal theg pas sbyor ba ma yin/ 'dod
317a2(mdo): chags zhe sdang gti mug sems pani/ ngan song dag tu srung bar 'gyur bang / snying rje chen mo 'a mo 'akrus te/ sdug 'bras kun las grol bar byed do// rigs kyi 'u gzha yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig
317a3(mdo): ma mo yang dag par rig pa// rnam sa pa'i dbyings dang sa nyam sa/ chad byed pa mtha' mam pa/ shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gsungs rnams dang/ shin tu brtam ma
317a4(mdo): bzod pa chen po / go chen po'i 'kham mo yong ngo // bya ma dam dpa' ses pa dpa' chen po gang mdzang sa 'di ldanan/ thon zums bskyed pa nas 'dod pa sna yongs su bsas te/ nyan thos pa
317a5(mdo): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las gnad tu 'das pa// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyisasod nams kyi nim chen por 'grub pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung 'dra
317a6(mdo): bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par
317a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa chad byed pa/ mthal yas bzhind tu rgyache ba dang / dran pa'i jo snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos
317a8(mdo): sems cad ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gsungs rnams dang / shind tu brtan pa'i go mchen po'i 'khob lo zhes/ 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad bzhin du du rtog pa ni/ ji snyam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o
317b1(mdo): ma pa sa byu sa zhin rnamams macas sdus ma rjed gyig ma pagapa pabyed pa ga' 'dzid ma na can dang / rdzas tsam thams cadas bams sa kyad bkyang/ 
317b2(mdo): myong dang gzugapa dang / myig ginas par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral pa/ sems kyi phyad pa byed pa sas/ byig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed kyis tshor ba nas gsum skye ste/ bde ba dang / 
317b3(mdo): mug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa mchong lnga lnga sems rab tu zhi zhing chags pa byed do// de bzhin du na ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / na ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sgra dang dri dang / 
317b4(mdo): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce dang ro dang / sde'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus dang reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / 
317b5(mdo): sid dang chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te/ te reg pa'i ba tu gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems dang / yid dang na rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa byed do// sems
317b6(mdo): dang yid dang rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba rnas gsum ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa myed do// dus gsum gyi phung po dang
317b7(mdo): khams dang skye la ched rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa myed pa sems kyi gyod pa skyed pa'o// gang ji snyed khams gsum dang 'du byed gsum dang / reg bya gsum dang / tshor ba gsum dang / dbang po gsum dang / theg pa gsum dang / 
317b8(mdo): sdom pa gsum dang / rnam par grol ba gsum dang / rnam pa gsum thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba gnas myed pa'i/ mtshan ma myed pa/ yend pa myed pas/ mnye ba nyid du gan so// gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod
318a1(mdo): par spongs pazhi dang / rdu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pani dang / dbang pon pa spongs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i sam yin lag brgyad pa sa yod sems kyis myod pa rab tu zhi bar rab tu gnas so
318a2(mdo): gang ji snyed dag mthar kyis gnam pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang sems kyis gyod pa myed par rab tu zhi bar gnas so// gzhan yang mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la bsgribs pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / lam gyi lan
318a3(mdo): lag dang / lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la a par lend pa myed dpa'i sems kyis gyod pa myed pa// kun gzhi'i rnam par zhes pa dang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang / nye bar lend pa dang / 
318a4(mdo): bcas pa dang / nye bar lend pa skyed pa dang / zag sa dang bcas pa dab drika pa skyed pa dang / chu ros kyi bu dang / pha rol kyi bu dang / chung ngu dang / chen po dang / chang byed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / myi byed pa dang dge
318a5(mdo): ba dang / myi dge ba dang / lung du myi stond pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la byed pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa byed par rab tu zhi bar gnas so// gang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang 'bas mkhas pas/ sems can sbyin par byed pa nas srung
318a6(mdo): par bya ba gsum dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la/ lend pa myed pa'i sems kyi spyod pa myed par zhi bar gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
318a7(mdo): dga'akhor lo 'di'i dbang gis/ tshor ba nas gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / mtshan pa'i chos thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji snyed nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi'i
318b1(mdo): ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'dren par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i lhag mas gnyerd te/ 
318b2(mdo): ngan 'gro mnar myed dang / gzhan srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnam gsum 'khor bas 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bas lad te/ rnam par smind pa'i 'bras bu myi myong bar byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 
318b3(mdo): mun pa nag pos nam mkha'i thams cad g.yob na nyi ma shard pa'i che/ mun pa thams cad sel par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byangang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa tshad myed pa ma
318b4(mdo): yas pa yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pani ste sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shi nad tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro// 
318b5(mdo): gzhan yang nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi bo 'i ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pas go cha chen po'i 'khor lo kan sa pas// dpag tu myed pa nam mkha'i ye shes nyi mas phyin ci log
318b6(mdo): bzhi'i mun pa yongs su gsal te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyerd te/ ngan 'gro myed pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa da 5/ 'gro ba nam gsum 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag
318b7(mdo): ma ma lus par yongs su bas lang te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar myi byed do// gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po li lag tu myi 'gro zhing/ 
318b8(mdo): rjes su myi gyod pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / myi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nyi gnas mthong ba dang / kyi 'bras pa dang / chos thos pa dang phyi 'bras pa dang / dge' 'dun pa martsod pa dang / badren
319a1(mdo): bkur byed pa dang kyi 'argal pa dang / yon tan mams das thems gyi choms panis phreng ma kyi bar du tan gyi 'ang de/ gtag tu mangs rgyam rjes su dran pa dang / myi 'bras pa ni chung du rmyilam tu yang chad pa byed par 'gyur ro// 
319a2(mdo): rigs kyi ni des ji ga pan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po sa yang dag par rig pas rnam sa tha'i dbyings dang zhes pa chad byed pa mga' yos pa yang sa zhing tshum ba dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi mos mams cad de/ 
319a3(mdo): ting nge 'dzind nams dang / gzungs rnams dpan shind tu brten pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'i snyoms par 'dug/ 
319a4(mdo): pa dang kaunam mamayi la myom ched nos 'dushes byed 'dug sa myed kyi dan skye mched 'i snyoms par 'dug pa dang / 'du zhes 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas da chor la
319a5(mdo): nam gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum po yongs su bcad de/ mngon para'adu byed pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa myed pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa la
319a6(mdo): sogs pa/ kun gcod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas zhag gcig kam/ zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind de las langs na yang sems rab tu zhi ba/ len pa myed cing lhan ner
319a7(mdo): gnas par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang don dam pa'i mkhas gtugs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind la mnyam par gzhog go// ting nge 'dzind de la gnas na / sems rab tu mnyam pas nas mkha' snya chags pa skyed pa dang / lus kyi 'bru
319a8(mdo): Shi Tu ka kun nas zil dang kyi thigs pas skar ma sA ra ma lta bu mngon par byung bas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bcings pas yongs su gdung ba thams cad seld par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ yang dag pa'i dranaH/ 
319b1(mdo): the ba ste/ dka' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyurd pa ni// ji ltar lha'i sras po dbang phyug chen po/ bde ba'i ting nge 'dzind thams cad las 'dug pa nas// lus kyi be spu'i zhung bu nas rab tu bde bar myong ba bzhin/ de ltar/ 
319b2(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde bar reg pas// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba myed do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas
319b3(mdo): gcig yi sa byas nasangs rgyas gcig mthong ba/ gal te sangs rgyam mang po med la byas la/ sangs rgyas yang po mthong ngo // gas te sangs rgyas kyi sku nyung ba yid la byas yang / sangs rgyas kyi su byang du 'bong ngo // gas te sangs rgyas kyi
319b4(mdo): chen por ying la byas ma sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong ngo // gas te dngas rgyas kyi sku mad byed pa yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku chang byedadapam mthong ngo // gal te bdag gi sum sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ma nga
319b5(mdo): ldan par yid la byas na/ bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra thams canaphun sum 'tshogs par mthong ngo // gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyasakyi skur yid la byas na/ gzhan gyi lus dang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang
319b6(mdo): 'dra bar mtshan phun sum 'tshogs par mthong ngo // gal te sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su rtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas la/ sems can dang sems can ma yin
319b7(mdo): pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum 'tshogs par mthong gi/ gzugs gzhan du myi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de'i me yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad dang gzugs thams
319b8(mdo): cad ni sgyu ma dpa' dra ste// yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba ni gsum dang / 'du byed gsum la bsdogs pa/ chos thams cad sgeg ma lus par yongs su gcod do// snyam nas 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
320a1(mdo): da pon mi dzi dzi na pa sa rgyas kyi ma can dang 'angs bya
320a2(mdo): da / gzugs pa yang rnas da / yang dag su gyupa'i sems dpa mam na mam sa ngas pa
320a3(mdo): ba'i bzod pa chen po'i gomachen mo'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'tsho mo 'di dang ldananan nam ma'a' myig dang / rtswa thal ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams la shin tu
320a4(mdo): thabs mkhas pa thams cad lhag sa la lus par spangs te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu len par myi byed do// gnas sa rigs kyi su 'dis sog 'jig rte rang gi khams su skyes 'jig pa byung du nye ba na/ nyi ma lda can ci
320a5(mdo): shard te/ 'jig rten gi khams mthing bu dang / rdzing chen po dang / 'bab tu dang / 'bab tu chen po dang / mamo nga ma tsho chen po'ichurnams lhag sa ma lus pa sathams cad skyems par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bya bachub sos
320b1(mdo): yang ga mos yang dag par rig pa nam mtha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa chad byed pa'i mtha' yas pa yangs shing gyub dang ldan byas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gsungs rnam sa
320b2(mdo): shinang tu btam pa'i mthod pa chen pa gomachen po'i ma' dum mdzad par shed to// gzhan ya nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi thal ting nge 'dzin dun pas dang / gzungs rnams la babs mkhas pa'i go mchen po 'i
320b3(mdo): so yang gnas zhing 'dres par 'gyur // gang 'das pa'i dus kyi ldog pa myi dge pa'i lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gros da myed pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba nas gsum 'khor bar 'khor ba'i pa thams cad
320b4(mdo): 'di'i mas tha can pa bzhi dang / ming za brgyad kyi dang / rings pa rgyal po dang / dri zin bams cad cu'im 'gyus te/ shogan lhags la sus par 'a par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub pamam
320b5(mdo): ba na mas yang ngan par rig pa rnam sa 'a'i bying sa dang mnyam bachad byed pa mas la yas pa sangs shing byu ba dang ldan d+has kyi snyed mang+yas rgyas kyi ma mas cad de/ ting 'dond rnams dang / gzungs rnam pa dang / gan tu
320b6(mdo): brtan pa'i bzod pa'i gomachen po 'i 'khor lo yang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro// nam ma tha'i khyig dang / skye ma'i ti 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams yi khabs la'os pa'i gomachen po la'i kho man napa goba'i
320b7(mdo): 'gyu / 'das pa'i sa kyi ge rdzi dge pa'i mas kyi sem na thams mU s+dza
321'a1(mdo): 'gro ba rnam su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las mkhas pa'i go ma chen po'i 'khom lo la yang gnas par 'gyu rog/ 'tshor mo 'dri la glanas pas mngag tu rmes pa namakha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyis byung bus te rang gi lus
321'a2(mdo): la phyin ci log bzhi dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thad yongasu sel bar 'gyu ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i rgyas kyi steg mas gser te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnam su 'a
321'a3(mdo): ba'i las tha~Md kyis kyang lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bsal te ka rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi myong bar byed// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na// thog ma seMsos
321'a4(mdo): bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga songasu bosal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thaMd las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos
321'a5(mdo): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa tha~Md kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba da da/ bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// mkhor lo 'di'idabang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tha~Md kyi dbang du 'gyur ba dang / phyir
321'a6(mdo): mildog pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa'i dbang du mi 'gro ba dang / spangs rgyas blad 'thong ba dang / myi 'bral zhing khyang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas 'thong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa
321'a7(mdo): dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thaMd la sems mi ngoms pa ste/ mngon par byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang rtag tu sangs rgyas
321'a8(mdo): rjesu dran pa dang / mi 'bral ba ni chung ngu ni rmi lam na yang mi 'bral bar byed// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang myur du rdzogs pa dang / ring po mi thogs par rnam pa/ 
321'b1(mdo): dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams cad rdzus te/ skye ba dang mtshan dang gzugs sangs
321'b2(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba nyon mongs pa srab cing chung ba theg pa chen po la bde bar gnas pa sha stag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar zla ba'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad de bkang
321'b3(mdo): bstsal pa/ chos kyi snod du gyur par 'dod pa dag/ nyon mongs thams cad yongasu bcad par bya// yang dag stong pa nyid la snyoms zhugs nas// dngos po grang yang bya bar dka' ba yin// srid pa'i
321'b4(mdo): bcings pa thaMd bcad pa'i phyir// snyoms par 'jug la nan ta naMbartson par bya'o// ting 'dzin yon tan dag dang ldan da pas nA// don mi za bor dpag dka'i shes rab thob// gzugs
321'b5(mdo): med pa'i bsam gtan rab sgom zhing // 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin stong bya nyid rtogs na// sangs rgyas dran dang blo rab mchogaskyes te ka/ sdig pa tha~Md yongasu zad 'gyur ro// yod dang med pa'i chos nas
321'b6(mdo): thad ni/ yang dag stong pa nyid du rtags pas bcom// ngan pas 'gro ba'i rgyun rnams yongs pas la nas// rtag tu sangs rgyas mang po 'thor byar 'gyur// yang dag stong pa nyid la rab sgom pas kyi dge ba'i chos
321'b7(mdo): gzhan kun la brtson bya ste// sangs rgyas thaMd kun la rab mchod na// myur du sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sbyin kun gyi dge ba'i grogs bya ste// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nad gsal na// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du myur
321'b8(mdo): du skye/ mngon par 'tshang rgya byang chub chen po thob// sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa'i se re dag/ sangs rgyas zhing 'drar yongasu gang lar 'gyuraro// thod sangs rgyas thig yo 'dren pa ste/ nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yongasu slong
322'a1(mdo): 'phags pa shin du rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu po zhes bya ba las bsod nams kyi zhing gyi mtshan nyid kyi leSh+ma zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos chen po'i rnam grangs 'a
322'a2(mdo): bshad pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gri bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa la goms pa dag deng 'dir
322'a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa la nan tan bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa thos nas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo mo thob bo// gzhan yang seMn tshad med grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos
322'a4(mdo): nas ting 'dzin gyi 'tsho ba me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyidasgo mo zang tho po// guzhan yang son tshad med grangs mod pa dag bcomamyangan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ dpa' bar
322'a5(mdo): 'gro ba klog gi 'od la rten pa zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo mo thad thob po// gzhan yang snron med nyid grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyisabashad pa thos nas ka chos la sgyur ba 'od snang
322'a6(mdo): ba las rten par byed pa rjesu 'thun pa'i bzod pa tha~Md thob po// gzhan yang son tshad med grangs med pa dag ni / bcom ldan 'das kyis bgad pa thos nas ko rdul dang dri ma dang bral te// chos la chos kyi mig
322'a7(mdo): rnam par dag pa skyes sbyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang seMn tshad mid grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas galan cig phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 
322'a8(mdo): gzhan yang seni med med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'dres bu thob bro// gzhan ming seMn tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas
322'b1(mdo): khams gsum gyi btson ra nas 'byung bar rtsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das la rten cing rab tu byung nas/ srang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to// gzhon yang seMn tshad med grangs med pa nam 'tsho'i bar du dge
322'b2(mdo): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas shing nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sen tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ 
322'b3(mdo): nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam pa bde bar gnas nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi jog par sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang se ni tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom
322'b4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i Tang las kyi lam la ba de bar gnas nas ka theg pa chen por sems bskyed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
322'b5(mdo): chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang sems can chad med gre ngas med pa dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bo shad pa thos nas/ 'jig rten gyi lta ba yang dag pa thob par
322'b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// yang dag par lta ba de'i dbang gis/ ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa tha~Md byang nas 'tho ri su 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam dang
322'b7(mdo): dge ba'i las thaMd skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang seMn tshad med grangs med pa drug bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa de thos nas/ dkon mcheg gsum la skyabasu song ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa
322'b8(mdo): blangs nas/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la spro ba dang / chos thos pa la dga'i pe dang dge 'dun gyi g.yog byed pa lce mos te/ nyin mtshan du'i bde ba'i brtson 'grus la sems pa tshad med par 'gyur/ 
323'a1(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnam kha'i sring po pa 'di ga rje sa ga ba bya'i do// gas kyi rtsu ba'i phying po 'a mo chu za skrod pa med po chos kyi ngo mo 'di khyod kyi lag tu btod kyis gzungs su gtsu
323'a2(mdo): la shin du rgyas par gyis shig/ seM na gang chos kyi rnam grangs nga 'dril klog gam/ 'dzin tam yi 'i byed dum/ gzhan la rgya che'achad tam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag po khyod
323'a3(mdo): kyis chos rnam pa 'di sus bsrungs te bu ring bor ba da ba 'de ba'i din thob par gyis zhig bcu gang zhe na/ 'di kyi ste de tshu sngo thabs dang mgo pa'i nor thams cad bzung rtsi snyos
323'a4(mdo): sa bya bdang / bya ba sa smras te/ pa 'a bar byu dang sog par phyogs pa las bskyes te ma ga de cu'i las kyi ba'i spangs par bya
323'a5(mdo): de'i lus dang ngag la gnod pa tha~Md las bsrungs te med par bye ba dang / 'cha ba dang skur ba thaM daM las srungs te med par bya ba dang / tshug khrims dang spyod pa tha~Md nyams par mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba dang / 
323'a6(mdo): de la mo yin pa thaMd dang 'byung ba chen po 'khrugs pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i nad dang / dga' ba thad yongasu sel bar bsrung ba dang / de la dus me yin pa'i tshul ma yin pa ltas ngan dang rims thaMd mi 'byung
323'b1(mdo): bar bsrung ba dang / de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang / sangs rgyas tha~Md 'thong bar bsrung ba dang / de tshe 'phos nas bde 'gror skye ba dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par yongasu bsrung bar byed// rigs kyi bu
323'b2(mdo): seMn gleng chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang don byed pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad dam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pag dag la chos rnam pa 'di bcus shin du bsrung zhing byin gyis bzlas
323'b3(mdo): te/ rjes rnam pa bcus yun ring por dran pa dang ba bar gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namakha'i snying po sron bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de de bzhin
323'b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungs susu 'dzin cing shin du rgyas partsa bgyi'o// seMn gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / don yid la bgyi ba dang
323'b5(mdo): pha rol po la rgya cher ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas stsal gnas pa dag la/ bdag gis rnam pa 'di banus shin du bzungs te/ yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi'o/ 
323'b6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gsungs pa'i tshe/ 'khor bye dkyis 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' chen po namakha'i snying po dang/ khyong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i snying po dang / 
323'b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po rigs par the com 'dri bri dang / tshangs blo chen po lha'i skyeng po dang khyo dang ku dro shig nod sbyin dang / dri za dang rtswa mya yin dang / rim kha' rdzi byu
323'b8(mdo): dang / skyo 'phyechen po dang / me dang mim yin pa la sogs bya 'khor ma' po byed/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa khyim ldan par dgan 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpo'i sar steng / 
323'b9(mdo): byang chub se ngor so dor chen po ji'i snying po
324'a1(mdo): bya 'i du spyo pa byong nga nis rgyu ba'i skye pa rjod d+hA skad du/ myu kau shA gtan ma 'dus nas rgyu/ 'od skad du 'gas
324'a2(mdo): thonam pa'i snying po zhes byu ba/ theg pa chen po'i d+mo/ sa kyi dang byung chub sems da thasas du'i phyag ba 'din de bdag rjes thos pa'i dus gajog na kho ma ldan 'dugyu reg
324'a3(mdo): sbyin na du slong sa kyi sa na/ derje pa nyid co drung ba pa ge slong na rgyu chen po dang / 'as gceg so 'a rlung chumasam me dpa mtshan da
324'a4(mdo): na po ga rlu kyi skyed sa na kyi dang pa rgya napa sa su bye ci ga zhung bskrun dus
324'a5(mdo): zab tu yang di'i ni n+ya ts+tsho sa ma rten de'i rlon da po mi 'brus thag dums paskon cing ban tu dar ba'i ming nakyi nor bu rin pa me snang ste/ yang nor burin po me de'i 'ad kyi
324'a6(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gzun su snang bzed ma lus par me snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa martogs par lha dang mi rnams dang / grang nyan thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
324'a7(mdo): rnams dang / gangs dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi gtsugasu snang ba'i 'byung ba chen po slong ba de dag thangs lus par spangs par gyur cing nor bu chen po sdang // ga ma dag kyang mtha' las su med pa brjod du med pa
324'a8(mdo): tu med pa na mkha' bzhin du snang // bcom ldan 'das kyang shin du lha me snyen ljang ra gyur to// son gang dag der 'dus pa de dag kyang bdag kyang mi mthong gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong // de dag la 'byung ba chen ba'i
324'b1(mdo): gtsug su spang ba tha~Md 'gags nas yang mig la snang bar gyur to// bdag lus kyi gzugs dang mtshan dang dbyings dang / reg pa yang mi dmigs par gyur te/ gang dang gang gis rtags pa de dag snang bar 'tho / 
324'b2(mdo): ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kyang mi mthong // skar ma'i gzugs dang / sa'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to// sgra dag rna lam tu skrag par ma gyur to// de dag kyang snal
324'b3(mdo): khro bar ma gyur to// sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la yang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung bar gyur to// yang 'byung ba chen po dag mi dmigs par gyur te/ phyogs gang
324'b4(mdo): dang gang du rtags pa de dang de'i phyogs thaMd du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugasu 'thong bar 'gyuraro// rgyang ma nas brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches bskor ba'i yid
324'b5(mdo): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las/ gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gang de na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gan lab dpa' bar 'gro ba'i tinge 'dzin thob pa// skye ba cig gis thon
324'b6(mdo): pasrid pa'i tha ma de dag gis ltas te 'thong nas 'jigs par mi byed/ spangs par mi byed/ skrag par mi byed/ chos tha~Md rang bzhin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs
324'b7(mdo): pas de'i phyir de dag 'jigs par byed/ skrag par mi bye'o// gang lhag ma'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po dag dang / nyan thos dag deng / lha dag dang / klu dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / dri za dag dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha'
324'b8(mdo): rjo dung / de la gyi dang / khyo chen po dang / sbrul ku dang/ drwa tu dang/ sha ma dang ldem du dag zus snrel blo dang / dang sa mayi na ga zu pa de na ma rgyal par leg par gyur/ dra sa par gyus myong churan/ 
325'a1(mdo): tshu po dang pa rob sa rmongs sde choms zhugs nis/ de dag gi tsag sa skyeg can mi mthongs don 'di ji 'og zhig/ 'a tsho'i rang bzhin zhes 'dri ba yang mi // yang de'i tshe byang chubu se tshes dpa' mam/ 
325'a2(mdo): dpang chen gyims pa da ser bu med pa nis bya / sa na sapa ston byo rgya ba 'du srin po po'i phyo kyis ni rang bzhin pa// gang gagang dag pa la ma pa/ gzugs phreng ba nigs
325'a3(mdo): dbang drug pa yongs par gyur// nga bo gcig rnaM mi mthong dang // dugs kyi byung po zhes dbyed pa// nga sa gang thas kha cig no/ sa kyim rgyas la the ma 'ams// com ldan 'das kyis 'di dag la
325'a4(mdo): chos kyi de bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs// de dag tshu rol pha rol la// bzod pa na mkha' can 'tshalo// 'di ni mnyam bzhag dpa' ba ste// brjod du med pa'itshan lag so// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen che// spyi bo la ni mchis pa
325'a5(mdo): bda'/ nor bu rin chen brgya byin thogs// gang dag la ni rgyang nas dga'// seMn de dag bskal pa che// dpa' 'gro'i pha rol shin tu phyan// ston par lta kha mchis pa rnams// de dag thaMd shes rab che// di ring 'dir ni zab
325'a6(mdo): mo'i gtam// 'chi bar 'gyur ba don mi 'tshal// bcom ldan gang 'dir phyin pa ya// se ni dag la dbugs 'byung mdzod// seMn yongs sman bgyid slad du/ 'di ni dbang po'i spyod yul lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa
325'a7(mdo): drin byas pa de bzhin te// gang na kun ga ge thos kyu da // shes ras kyis ni minagan pa// don tang 'dzi spyod su'o// 'dzin nas pa'i snying po 'i/ byang chub rims dpa'i spyong mu de// snang ba med pang rlos med pa'i/ ting len
325'a8(mdo): nide sem than// rgya gnyis la gang zugs de/ khyi phyir zhing ni ngas par 'gyu / tan dang tshad la chags pa nig tshu rob pacho shin du mongs phra ba gnyis pa na las lab tu grol bar du 'dod pa/ 'dod med pa rnam
325'b1(mdo): gyis/ des ni sbyar dus thob 'gyur// kye grogs po de dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma pa la/ de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyi dmigs pa dang / bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
325'b2(mdo): brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ cig nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin skye zhing / 'jigs pa shes par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu bzod chos tha~Mng brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ mi skye mi 'gag mi dmigs pa cung zad kyang med
325'b3(mdo): 'du shes thang sgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang rtag pa dang chad pa spang bar 'gyur ba dag/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos tha~Md la chags par dmigs pa'i sem su ma gyur par byas nas/ de myur du pha rol du phyin
325'b4(mdo): pa drug yongasu rdzogs shing / phyin chad kyang rtag pa dang / chad pa dang mi nga gnas par 'gyu ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal nas/ nga'akhor der lhags pa tha~Md kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji ltar
325'b5(mdo): 'thong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes pa de bzhin du 'khor der 'thong bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas byam ma brkyang ste 'di skad ces bka' bstsab to// nam kha'i snying po zhes
325'b6(mdo): bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pag byang chub sems dpa'i slab pa'i rab dang mtshungs pa yi shes nas de' dang mtshungs pa/ brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa bzod pa rdo rje dang
325'b7(mdo): mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyi ni rgyal mtshan gyi mchog lta bu/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i gan su 'gro ba rnams kyis ni sde dpon lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thaMd kyis ni gter lta bu/ sdug bsngal tha~Md kyis ni bum pa bzung
325'b8(mdo): po lta bu dmun par bcug pa rnams kyis ni nyi ma lta bu/ lum stor bu rnams kyis ni zla ba lta bu/ 'jigs pa rnams kyis ni ri rab lta bu/ nyon mongs pa nad kyis gtungs pa rnams kyis ni sman bcud kyis len pa lta bu'o// / 
326'a1(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba cad de srung ba rnams kyi ni 'khor ba ma bu'o// greng ba las 'phyo ba rnams kyis ni me chog blon sdom gyi spyong pa rnams kyis ni me mdza lta bu/ ngo ma shes pa dang khrel yod pa spangs pa sa
326'a2(mdo): kyi na gos sta b+ha/ mya ngan las 'das 'gro ba rnams kyi ni stegs lnga buM/ pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyis ni rgya b+he// 'gro po rnams kyi ni tho sa sras bug tshig ngan pa dang bskul bas gdus pa rnams kyi na~M
326'a3(mdo): gtugs lnga b+hA// pi rol gyi grol ba rnams kyi ni song ge l+ya bu// N+Da ra pa rnams kyi chu lha bu// bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni go cha lta bu// skabs po lathus pa rnams kyis ni mig 'byed pa lta bu// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i me tog thang
